 Engage in active selling of safety management services, set-up and planning of transfer of safety database to PR, working closely with the clinical development team.
* **Team Building:** 
 Recruit, build, and lead a high-performing safety team as the business grows.
* **Client Engagement:** 
 Interact directly with clients to understand their needs, present safety solutions and processes, and ensure satisfaction.
* **Compliance and Innovation:** 
 Ensure compliance with safety regulations and stay updated on industry trends to continuously improve our offerings.



  





**Qualifications:** 




  




* Extensive experience in patient safety or pharmacovigilance, ideally within a consultancy or CRO.
* Strong business development skills and preferable proven track record in sales.
* Experience with safety databases, and beneficial to have vendor selection and procurement.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
* Willingness to travel across the Nordics.



  





**Why PharmaRelations?** 




  





 We are offering a
 
 strategic role with significant impact on PharmaRelations’ growth. You will have the opportunity to build and lead a safety team from the ground up and to work in a dynamic and collaborative working environment across the Nordics.
 



  





 Joining PharmaRelations means being part of a forward-thinking community who is passionate about making a difference in patients' lives. We offer a challenging yet supportive work environment where innovation, creativity, and personal growth are encouraged.
 



 PharmaRelations offer a place where there is room for you to excel, be valued and make a difference.
 



  





 At PharmaRelations we aim to become the best place to work within Nordic Life Science Industry. We follow
 *Great Place to Work’* 
 s model, and our definition of “the best” is to get the highest results among all Nordic Life Science companies in the GPTW model. It is a challenging goal, but we strive to always continue to challenge ourselves to continuously improve and become a better employer for each year.
 



  





 Apply today!
 



  





 For further information please do not hesitate to reach out to Moa Palm, Internal Recruiter Nordics; moa.palm@pharmarelations.se or Beatrice Öström, Nordic Head of Clinical Development; beatrice.ostrom@pharmarelations.se.
 



  





 Please send in your application as soon as possible, as interviews are being conducted on a continuous basis. We look forward to hearing from you!
 



  





 Due to GDPR we do not accept applications via email.

title: Lagerlogistiker till MediCarrier
description:
Logistiker
   

  

 Lagerlogistiker till MediCarrier
   

  

 Är du en innovativ person som vill jobba i en samhällsviktig verksamhet där du får möjlighet att utveckla lagersystem och optimera processer? Då kan detta vara en möjlighet för dig!
   

  

 MediCarrier rekryterar nu en lagerlogistiker med starkt IT-intresse för att utveckla och optimera lagersystem och processer. Här får du ett nyskapande och meningsfullt arbete där du utvecklar processer och system och stöttar den operativa driften på lagret för att säkerställa en god och välfungerande varuförsörjning. Som lagerlogistiker ingår du i avdelningen Lagerlogistik, som är en stödfunktion till lagerverksamheten med fem medarbetare.
   

  

 Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning på heltid och provanställning kan tillämpas. Det finns möjlighet att utföra en del av arbetet på distans. MediCarriers arbetsspråk är svenska och huvudkontor och konsolideringslager finns i Spånga med goda allmänna kommunikationer. Om du vill göra skillnad för medarbetare och patienter inom Region Stockholm samt vill arbeta på en inkluderande arbetsplats med många spännande projekt i närtid, varmt välkommen med din ansökan redan idag!
   

  

 Om tjänsten
   

  

 Som lagerlogistiker driver och bidra du till förbättringar inom våra lager- och logistiklösningar. Du spelar en nyckelroll i att optimera MediCarriers processer för att säkerställa effektivitet, noggrannhet och kostnadseffektivitet.
   

  

**Dina Arbetsuppgifter i Huvudsak**
* Identifiera utvecklingsmöjligheter och genomföra ständiga förbättringar i arbetssätt och processer, tillsammans med kollegor inom bolaget
* Ta fram och skapa rapporter som stödjer verksamhetens behov t.ex med hjälp av SQL
* Delta i projekt relaterade till logistik och lager
* Arbeta med förbättringar i lagersystemet
* Kartlägga och dokumentera lösningar.


 Vem är du?
   

  

 För att bli framgångsrik i den här rollen behöver du ha eftergymnasial utbildning inom logistik samt flerårig dokumenterad erfarenhet av utveckling och anpassning i produktion. Har du arbetat inom en lagerorganisation samt i lagersystem tidigare är detta meriterande. Du har hög IT-mognad med erfarenhet av Accessdatabaser, SQL och att bygga verktyg och sammanställningar i Excel. Vidare har du god förmåga att uttrycka dig på svenska, i både tal och skrift på svenska.
   

  

 Vi lägger stor vikt vid personliga egenskaper. Du är en engagerad, strukturerad och pålitlig person som tar ansvar för att leverera meningsfulla resultat. Du är motiverad av att göra förbättringar och ser värdet i små såväl som stora förändringar. Byggande av hållbara relationer och effektiv kommunikation är en naturlig del av din arbetsstil. Med din goda analytiska förmåga har du förmågan att se helheten och identifiera möjligheter till förbättringar. Dessutom är du öppen för att lära av andra och dela med dig av din egen kunskap och erfarenhet.
   

  

 Du delar MediCarriers värdegrund: Kompetens, Pålitlighet, Samverkan och Öppenhet.
   

  

 Om verksamheten
   

  

 MediCarrier erbjuder dig en flexibel och prestigelös organisation med högt engagemang där din kompetens kommer att göra skillnad! För rätt person finns goda utvecklingsmöjligheter, både inom rollen och företaget. Då MediCarrier är en del av Region Stockholm arbetar de med värdeorden samverkan, kompetens, pålitlighet och öppenhet. Dessa ord genomsyrar hela verksamheten. Som ny medarbetare får du ett omsorgsfullt utformat introduktionsprogram som syftar till att du ska få en förståelse för hela bolaget och din roll. Ett hälsofrämjande arbetsliv är viktigt och därför erbjuds du friskvårdsbidrag och friskvårdstimme. Dessutom har du möjligheten att nyttja MediCarriers företagsgym samt delta i andra hälsofrämjande aktiviteter.
   

  

 Om du vill göra skillnad för medarbetare och patienter inom Region Stockholm samt vill arbeta på en inkluderande arbetsplats med många spännande projekt i närtid, sök det här jobbet!
   

  

 MediCarrier AB är Region Stockholms logistik- och transportföretag. Vi är vårdens centrallager för sjukvårds- och förbrukningsartiklar och utför samordnade transporter av prover, läkemedel och internpost, med fokus på effektivitet och låg miljöpåverkan. Vi omsätter ca 1.3 miljarder kronor och är nästan 200 medarbetare. På lagret hanterar vi 10 000 orderrader per dag och transporttjänster gör 30 000 angöringar per månad. Vi förstärker nu vår lagerorganisation med en lagerlogistiker.
   

  

 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan. Urval sker löpande, ansök därför redan idag genom att klicka på ansök på https://www.poolia.se.
   

  

 Poolia är ett registrerat rekryterings och bemanningsföretag, vi är auktoriserade av Kompetensföretagen och har kvalitetssäkrade processer och rutiner.

title: Business Controller
description:
**Join our journey as a Business Controller for Marketing & Communication** 
 at Dustin Group, where you'll lead financial strategies, collaborate closely with top-tier stakeholders, and enjoy the freedom to drive impactful changes in a supportive and innovative environment. If you're ready to combine independence with a team-oriented mindset, this is your chance to shape the financial landscape of a thriving organization.
   

  

**As a Business Controller, You'll Get To**
* Drive financial projects to shape strategic decisions and drive growth and profitability.
* Collaborate closely with Dustin’s top management, providing valuable financial insights and business support.
* Enjoy a high degree of ownership, supported by an experienced team, fostering a dynamic environment for proactive change and continuous improvement.


**My name is Adam Fröman. I am the manager for Marketing & Communication Business Control** 
 . As a leader I am supportive, transparent and communicative. I believe in winning as a team. I place expectations on continuous improvement and encourage curiosity both within myself and my team. I believe it's important to foster a supportive, transparent and fun work environment together.
   

  

**Your role & influence as a Business Controller**
*Responsibility:* 
 You will be responsible for Monthly Reporting, Forecasts, Budget, driving financial projects and business cases, and continuously developing financial insights and reporting.
   

  

*Collaboration:* 
 You'll work closely with your immediate team members and the Marketing & Communication Leadership Team, fostering collaboration across the company and directly towards parts of Dustin Leadership Team.
   

  

**Core Activities**
* Financial planning & follow-up: Develop and oversee financial plans, tracking profitability and analyzing variances to optimize performance.
* Business Partnering: Close collaboration with the Marketing, Communication & Sustainability department, providing financial insights to drive strategic decisions.
* Continuous improvement: Actively contributing to increase efficiency and improvements of way of working within the Business Control team.


**This is what we imagine you bring to the table**
 We envision you as a curious and driven individual who thrives in a collaborative environment, excels in financial analysis, and possesses a passion for continuous improvement.
   

  

**Additionally, It's Important That**
* You have a Bachelor's degree in Economics, Industrial Economics or equivalent
* You have a solid understanding of the business perspective of finance
* You are proficient in explaining complex information to top management
* You posses a strong skill set in Microsoft Office


**What can you expect next?**
 We will treat your application anonymously. We expect the following next steps in the recruitment process:
   

  

* Telephone screening
* 1st interview with Adam Fröman


 For questions about the position, please contact Adam Fröman via e-mail: adam.froman@dustin.com

title: Senior Talent Acquisition Partner - Sales
description:
**Job Description**
*Are you an experienced talent acquisition professional with a passion for building teams in close collaboration with your hiring managers? Does being part of one of Europe’s fastest growing companies interest you? If so, then we’d love to chat!*
**Role background**
 Wolt is a technology company that makes it incredibly easy to discover and get the best restaurants, grocery stores and other local shops’ goods delivered to your home or to the office. We were founded in 2014 and today team members across 25 countries, servicing over 20 million registered users. In June 2022, we joined forces with DoorDash
   

  

 Our Talent Acquisition team has been on an incredible journey throughout this time too. We’re now a global team of 130+ based across multiple European countries, Tokyo and Tel Aviv. As part of our phenomenal growth, we are now looking for an experienced
 **Talent Acquisition Partner - Sales** 
 to join our business talent acquisition team, responsible for finding exceptional talent for our sales organisation.
   

  

 As a
 **Senior Talent Acquisition Partner - Sales** 
 , you’ll be owning the end-to-end recruitment process while managing the relationships with your key stakeholders and always putting candidate experience and quality of hire at the heart of everything you do.
   

  

 This is a great opportunity for someone who is passionate about the future of recruitment, and wants to develop and improve hiring processes together with Wolt’s business leaders, as well as impact strategic initiatives such as diversity attraction, market mapping of talent for new hubs, geographical expansion projects and more.
   

  

**What You'll Be Doing**
 Are you ready to take the helm in shaping our sales recruitment strategy? As the project lead for our hiring teams, you will craft and execute a robust hiring roadmap. You'll streamline processes and train interviewers, ensuring our team is equipped for success.
   

  

* Be the Go-To Expert: Leverage your experience and market insights to provide invaluable guidance to our hiring managers. Your well-informed data points and market understanding will help steer our recruitment efforts in the right direction.
* Pipeline Building: Champion a sourcing-first approach to build evergreen candidate pipelines for our sales roles to provide every candidate with an exceptional interview experience that showcases the best of what we offer.
* Think Big and Bold: Sales talent is tough to attract, but with your expertise in employer branding, online and offline marketing, you'll design and execute large-scale campaigns that captivate top talent.
* Data-Driven Decision Maker: Utilise talent acquisition tools and reporting to optimise our recruiting funnel, to increase candidate pass-through ratios, eliminate bottlenecks, and enhance KPIs such as monthly fill rate, time to hire, and cost per hire.
* Innovate and Excel: Constantly seek out new and innovative methods to attract the best global talent. Your dedication to recruiting best practices will set us apart in the competitive landscape.
* Collaborate and Conquer: Work closely with your sub-team and the broader TA team, sharing ideas, successes, and solutions to overcome hiring challenges. Together, we’ll build a strong and dynamic recruitment process.


**Our humble expectations**
* Experienced Recruitment Advisor: With several years of sales recruitment experience under your belt, you thrive on leading processes and offering strategic advice. You're not just a recruiter; you're a trusted advisor and a leader.
* Talent Pooling Pro: You've successfully managed talent pools, evergreen roles, and ongoing pipelines for continuous hiring. Your proactive approach ensures we always have top talent ready to join our team.
* Champion of Candidate Experience: Candidate experience is at the heart of everything you do. You make decisions with the candidate’s journey in mind, ensuring a positive and memorable experience.
* Global Team Player: You flourish in a fast-paced, international environment, collaborating with colleagues from around the world. You tackle bottlenecks head-on, ensuring smooth and efficient processes.
* Clear Communicator: Your communication skills are top-notch, both verbally and in writing. You engage effectively in English, ensuring everyone is on the same page.
* Data-Driven Recruiter: You value the power of data and believe in transparency. Sharing pipeline metrics and crucial data with your hiring teams is second nature to you, driving informed decisions and continuous improvement.


**Next Steps**
 If you are creative, like moving fast, and thrive in a dynamic environment where you get to be proactive and figure out what to do (rather than wait to be told) – then apply today.
   

  

 What you’ll get by joining us
   

  

* Opportunity to be part of building something exceptional, in an international environment.
* Lots of learning and growth in a globally scaling tech company.
* Along with a competitive salary and benefits, you will also be eligible for our long term incentive plan.


 Please note that we do not accept applications sent by email. You should submit your application through our careers website!
   

  

**About Wolt**
 Wolt is a Helsinki-based technology company that provides an online platform for consumers, merchants and couriers. It connects people looking to order food and other goods with people interested in selling and delivering them. To enable this, Wolt develops a wide range of technologies from local logistics to retail software and financial solutions – as well as operating its own grocery stores under the Wolt Market brand. Wolt’s products include Wolt+ (subscription service for customers), Wolt for Work (meal benefits and office deliveries for companies), Wolt Drive (fast last-mile deliveries for merchants) and Wolt Self-Delivery (service for merchant partners with their own delivery staff). Wolt’s mission is to make cities better by empowering and growing local communities. Wolt was founded in 2014 and joined forces with DoorDash in 2022. DoorDash operates in 29 countries today, 25 of which are with the Wolt product and brand.
   

  

**So, why work at Wolt?**
**At Wolt, We’re About Getting Things Done.**
 You’ll probably enjoy it here if you like taking ownership, developing yourself and being around friendly, humble and ambitious people.
   

  

 We work hard to make cities into better places, and it’s pretty cool seeing us grow every week. If you’re passionate about building things that just… work, Wolt might be for you.
   

  

**Our Commitment to Diversity, Equity & Inclusion**
 We want to have all sorts of people in our team – people like you and me, and people different from you and me. To be able to work with diverse teammates – when it comes to gender, age, ethnicity, life background, sexual orientation, political views, religion, or any other personal trait – we consciously aim to offer equal opportunity for everyone to work with us. This is because we believe diverse teams make the most thought-through decisions and build things in the most inclusive way.
   

  

 Join us today to build Wolt together.

title: Managementkonsult inom bank och finans till 421
description:
Vi på 421 fortsätter att växa och vi söker nu nya kollegor till vårt team med duktiga managementkonsulter.
 



  





 421 präglas av en familjär känsla med högt i tak och ett stort entreprenöriellt driv. Organisationen är platt och vår kultur uppmuntrar till nyfikenhet och utveckling. Hos oss blir du blir en del av ett resultatorienterat, proaktivt team med stark gemenskap.
 



  





 Här erbjudes du trygghet och stabilitet i ett väletablerat bolag - men med kreativitet, utvecklingsvilja och nytänkande i behåll. Arbetet hos oss innebär stor variation och komplexa utmaningar såväl hos våra kunder som internt. Det är endast du själv som sätter gränserna för vad du vill göra och uppnå!
 



  





 421 är ett stockholmsbaserat managementkonsultbolag som är verksamma inom den nordiska bank- och finansmarknaden. Vår branschkunskap är djup och vi är experter såväl inom betalningsområdet som inom förändringsledning och transformation.
 



  





 Hos våra kunder arbetar vi med olika typer av förändrings- och utvecklingsinitiativ, just nu bland annat inom områden som clearing & settlement, instant payments och ISO 20022. Vi arbetar med olika typer av uppdrag och i varierande roller, exempelvis:
 


* Arbete med strategier och produktutveckling
* Analys, krav- och utredningsarbete
* Driva förändring och affärsutveckling
* Delta i arbete kring affärs- eller IT-arkitektur



  





**Kvalifikationer** 




 Vi söker nu en ny kollega till teamet med ca 4-7 års relevant erfarenhet och du har:
 


* Erfarenhet från bank/finans och/eller managementkonsultrollen
* Erfarenhet antingen från projektledning eller från roller som t ex business analyst, testare eller liknande
* Förmåga att kommunicera mer komplexa idéer och förslag muntligt och skriftligt, på både svenska och engelska
* Kunskap inom betalningar eller intresse för att utvecklas inom området



  





 Utöver ovan har du också förmåga att ta dig an projekt och arbetsuppgifter på ett prestigelöst och framåtriktat sätt. Du trivs i teamleveranser och brinner för att engagera och lyfta dina kollegor. Vi arbetar alltid med våra värderingar i bakhuvudet och vill att du delar dem med oss. Att vara resultatdriven, proaktiv, nyfiken och agera respektfullt är extremt viktigt för oss och det styr vårt agerande såväl internt som externt.
 



  





 Vill du utvecklas tillsammans med oss? Hör av dig med din ansökan!

title: SAP SCM consultant to Accenture’s Nordic SAP Business Group
description:
Do you have a passion for transforming businesses with the newest technologies and making them data-driven companies? Are you looking for a place where you could combine your business consulting skills with technology strategy know-how? Then our roles as SAP consultant in our Technology practice are a perfect find for you!
   

  

 Bring your talent and passion to Accenture and help us deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity. Take this opportunity to develop your skills and build an extraordinary career. You will play a key role in transforming organizations and communities around the world. Let there be change!
   

  

**About Our SAP Nordics Practice**
 Accenture and SAP have a longstanding relationship that extends more than 40 years. As a leading business partner, we work with SAP end-to-end from product innovation, to development and delivery. Together, we are revolutionizing the future of business.
   

  

 We are market leading with SAP in the Nordics with close collaboration and a long-lasting relationship. We drive multiple major SAP transformation programs with some of the biggest companies. Within our Nordic SAP community, we work with the newest SAP solutions and offerings such as SAP S/4 HANA Cloud, SAP CX, Ariba, SuccessFactors, SAP BTP and SAP RISE.
   

  

 Accenture is not only leading with Technology but also functional expertise. If you are experienced in Finance, Supply Chain, Procurement or HR – you will find peers to develop together with.
   

  

 And, as we know – Data and Analytics is further key expertise we are looking for.
   

  

 We have a strong sustainability agenda. As advisors, innovators and solution developers, we help clients define and enable sustainability strategies – reduce carbon footprints, for example, or curb waste – and, at the same time, create new sources of value for the business.
   

  

 We are now looking to expand our community at scale and are looking at candidates for several positions and seniority levels.
   

  

 To read more about our SAP Practice, visit us at
   

  

 https://www.accenture.com/se-en/services/sap-index.
   

  

**What’s in it for you:**
- Work with some of the biggest SAP clients in large global implementation projects.

- Be an integral part of innovative SAP transformation projects.

- Significant development opportunities and support for progressing in your professional career.

- Rich opportunities to develop your business acumen, consulting toolbox, technical and professional skills.

- Access to comprehensive tools and frameworks supported by our global organization, including implementation methodologies, knowledge databases, industry leading add-on software, expert network and benchmarks.

- A dedicated mentor to guide you during your work with continuous feedback.

- Being part of our culture and core values in a truly human work environment.

- Utilize your functional and technical expertise in SAP Supply Chain and other, by analyzing, designing, and implementing business processes supported by SAP best practice solutions.

- Utilize your Industry expertise in the field of SAP solutions to deliver client value as a professional individual and as part of a team.

- Take part in our highly engaged and diverse global network, for collaboration and delivery.

- Competitive compensation and benefits.

- Help clients’ sustainability agenda through SAP transformations.

- Be a valuable member of our Nordic SAP Supply Chain team and contribute to thought leadership, competence development, and sales initiatives.

**Qualifications**
**About our SAP SCM Practice**
 Our SAP Supply Chain Management practice is the largest in the industry, a great community of colleagues, and a key area of focus for our clients. Accenture has an extensive footprint in the Nordics within Retail, Industrial Equipment, Consumer Goods, Automotive, and Chemicals. An optimized Supply Chain is critical in all those segments, in particular under the current dynamic market conditions.
   

  

 Our team and services cover notably:
   

  

  

- Supply Chain Planning, leveraging SAP solutions such as IBP, S/4HANA Advanced Planning, and S/4HANA Advanced ATP

- Supply Chain Execution, including Warehousing (EWM), Transportation (TM), Global Trade Services (GTS), and Logistics Business Networks (LBN)

- Manufacturing, including S/4HANA Manufacturing, S/4HANA Quality Management, Digital Manufacturing Cloud (DMC) and Product Lifecycle Management solutions (PLM)

- Digital Asset Management, including S/4HANA Plant Maintenance and Asset Intelligence Network (AIN)

 If you love material flows, shop floor processes, or warehouse optimization, our team is a great home for you!
   

  

**Who we are looking for:**
**Required Qualifications**
- Min. 2+ years of hands-on SAP experience in one or more of the above mentioned areas, preferably in the Nordic region

- Hands-on Supply Chain experience from S/4HANA solutions

- Good understanding of Supply Chain process and their business value drivers

- Strong resonance with Accenture core values

- Willingness and ability to quickly learn new concepts and technologies

- Eagerness to shape and work in a team-oriented environment

- Motivated, persistent, eager to optimize, drive for excellence

- Passionate about SAP, innovation and delivery of the latest technologies to your clients

- Effectively work with cross-functional teams/stakeholders in an international and fast-moving environment

- Strong analytical skills, result-oriented paired with highly structured working style and good sense of responsibility, flexibility, and team player

- Excellent communication (verbal and written) and presentation skills to address technical and non-technical audiences in English

- Strong will to pursue a problem, identify the source, and propose possible solutions in collaboration with other team members in a timely manner

- A Bachelor or Master’s degree

**Preferred Qualifications**
- Experience in at least one S/4HANA or Digital Supply Chain Cloud solution implementation

- An SAP certification

- Experience across the full lifecycle, including estimating, planning, and delivering a solution end-to-end

- Deep business and industry experience in one or more of the industries

- Nordic (Danish, Norwegian, Swedish or Finnish) language spoken

title: Senior Account Executive - Nordics
description:
The
 **Senior Account Executive** 
 is responsible for obtaining new business and customer expansion sales opportunities from Executive-level buyers and influencers in either private or publicly traded companies. Senior Account Executives are focused on selling Workiva’s core platform and collaborate with other Workiva Solution Sales teams to deliver multi-solution sales.
   

  

 Successful candidates will build relationships and identify Workiva products and solutions that meet customer needs to drive customer acquisition within an assigned territory. Sales growth is attained through new customer subscriptions, professional services, delivery and training.
   

  

 This role is focused on enterprise customer accounts in the Nordics market.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Actively seek out sales opportunities in collaboration with peer Sales teams, Inside Sales, and Partnerships to generate qualified sales pipeline
* Utilize information gathered during the needs analysis phase to deliver a compelling demonstration of the Workiva platform
* Skillfully address customer objections - removing obstacles - and finding solutions to various client challenges
* Lead the sales process naturally - guiding it to a close by effectively showcasing Workiva's value proposition
* Regularly and promptly update customer relationship management tools to report customer contacts
* Provide consistent and accurate forward-looking information through pipeline analysis to forecast sales
* Develop and execute a sales strategy with purposeful action to secure the sale
* Rally internal support to pursue an account and optimize internal resources
* Prioritize selling activities and ensure timely follow-through
* Maintain a strong understanding of Workiva products through a commitment to ongoing training and a growth mindset
* Share knowledge, successes, lessons learned and best practices with peers across teams


**What You'll Need**
 Minimum Qualifications
   

  

* 6+ years experience in a related role - enterprise technology or similar complex solution sales
* Undergraduate Degree or equivalent combination of knowledge and related career experience


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Understanding of the Software as a Service (SaaS) business model
* Ability to demonstrate complex software applications
* Demonstrated experience navigating and delivering sales success across large, enterprise organizations
* Strong business acumen and an ability to understand complex business challenges
* Executive presence and an ability to communicate at the most senior level
* Ability to identify and understand the power of influencers versus buyers and how to navigate the nuances of each during the sales cycle
* Ability to manage multiple complex sales cycles simultaneously
* Ability to negotiate pricing with a focus on retaining value
* Capability for achieving (and exceeding) sales quota targets
* Fluency in English required - additional fluency in Danish, Finnish, Norwegian or Swedish a plus


**Travel Requirement & Working Conditions**
* Up to 30% travel for regular customer meetings and events
* Reliable internet access required for any period of time working remotely and not in a Workiva office


 Workiva is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We believe that great minds think differently. We value diversity of backgrounds, beliefs, and interests, and we recognize diversity as an important source of intellectual thought, varied perspective, and innovation. Employment decisions are made without regard to age, gender identity, race, religion, disability status, sexual orientation, or any other protected characteristic.
   

  

 Workiva is committed to working with and providing reasonable accommodations to applicants with disabilities. To request assistance with the application process, please email talentacquisition@workiva.com.
   

  

 Workiva employees are required to undergo comprehensive security and privacy training tailored to their roles, ensuring adherence to company policies and regulatory standards.

title: Regulatory Liaison Counsel - ISVs and Embedded Partners
description:
**Build your future with Sovos.**
 If you're seeking a career where innovation meets impact, you've come to the right place. As a global leader, Sovos is transforming tax compliance from a business requirement to a force for growth while revolutionising how businesses navigate the ever-changing regulatory landscape.
   

  

 At Sovos, we're dedicated to more than just solving compliance challenges – we're committed to making a positive and lasting difference in everything we do. Our teams operate on the modern edge of digital technology, working not only to solve complex business challenges but also to enrich our personal, professional, and local communities.
   

  

 Our purpose-built systems provide the tools you need to thrive in a world where governments demand increased visibility, faster reporting and greater control over business processes. Excited about the possibilities? So are we!
   

  

 Don’t worry if you don't check all the boxes – apply anyway! We're focused on hiring the right people, not just the "right" resume. It's not about what you've done elsewhere; it's all about what you're capable of doing here.
   

  

**The Work You'll Do**
 The Regulatory Liaison Counsel - ISVs and Embedded Partners will play a critical role in supporting and growing Sovos’ global ISV ecosystem and revenue stream by engaging with the Sovos partner ecosystem and supporting their needs as they look to Sovos for ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements in their solution portfolios and customer implementations. This position combines the expertise of a Regulatory Counsel, requiring deep knowledge and ongoing involvement in the processes of the Regulatory Analysis and Design Department, with the role of a liaison officer dedicated to facilitating partners’ access to the broader regulatory function within Sovos. This role reports to the VP of Regulatory Analysis and Design.
   

  

**More Specifically You Will**
* The Regulatory Liaison Counsel is responsible for bridging the gap between Sovos' regulatory expertise and its strategic ISV partners, ensuring seamless integration of relevant compliance aspects of Sovos solutions in various markets.
* Partner closely with Sovos functions managing the business and technical aspects of relationships with ISV partners to ensure satisfaction of partners’ compliance needs within the scope of Sovos software solutions.
* Maintain accountability for a ‘regulatory helpdesk SLA’ that allows Sovos partners to act with confidence, ensuring timely and appropriate Sovos regulatory input towards their customers.
* Ensure a deep understanding of Sovos Regulatory Affairs and broader interaction with public authorities on an ongoing basis.
* Work continuously with Sovos Alliances, Sales Engineering, Product Management, and other relevant functions to develop and maintain a robust understanding of Sovos’ partner ecosystem and the specific business processes and associated compliance needs that arise in that context.
* Represent the requirements of Sovos ISV and embedded partners in the evolving scope and day-to-day execution of regulatory monitoring, design, and affairs in close collaboration with colleagues in the Regulatory Analysis and Design Department, as well as with Regulatory Affairs, Business Analysts, Product Managers, and other Sovos colleagues involved in designing, building, implementing, supporting, and maintaining Sovos solutions.
* Act as an integral part of the Regulatory Analysis and Design Department, internalizing contextual and factual knowledge that allows the Regulatory Liaison Counsel to act as independently as possible in their key role towards Sovos partners while also maintaining an excellent understanding of roles, responsibilities, and time allocation for partner support within the larger Regulatory Analysis and Design Department.
* Support the VP of Regulatory Analysis and Design and their teams to ensure optimization of resources in support of all relevant Sovos functions and help them with time and resource planning towards that goal.
* Explain complex tax rules in clear language for both tax and non-tax professionals, internally and externally.
* Support Partner Marketing by providing tax-centric marketing material and participating in webinars.
* In collaboration with Sovos Marketing and partner management functions, participate as a Sovos regulatory thought leader and subject matter expert in Partner events, advisory boards, and publications.


**What We Need From You**
* Juris Doctor (JD) degree or equivalent master’s degree in law, finance, or accounting.
* Proficiency in legislative tracking and tax research techniques.
* Experience in working within and a deep understanding of the enterprise software market, including the value-add of different categories of enterprise software to size and geographic segments in the business sector.
* Experience in working with and deep understanding of businesses’ financial, logistical, administrative, and IT processes and strategies.
* A strong affinity for and proven ability to communicate effectively with professionals in information technology, data science, and computer-assisted business processes.
* Strong team orientation with a history of working collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
* Excellent research, analysis, and writing skills.
* Ability to read, interpret, and understand tax-related postings and documents.
* Ability to generate and interpret functional and high-level technical design content as it pertains to compliance and business processes.
* Self-motivated with a strong drive to succeed.
* Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and prioritize activities.
* Additional language skills are strongly preferred.
* Minimal travel required to Sovos locations and events.


**What Does Sovos Offer You?**
 The tools to enhance your life - because we want you to enjoy your life outside of work and inside!
   

  

* An opportunity to work with a global team
* Bi-Weekly Meeting Free Days!
* Mentoring Programs
* Globally recognised Training and Development programs
* Benefits


*Sovos is an equal opportunity employer committed to providing an environment that celebrates diversity and where equal employment opportunities are available to all applicants and employees. We do not discriminate against race, colour, religions, national origin, age, sex, marital status, physical or mental disability, veteran status, gender identity, sexual orientation, or any other characteristic provided by law. At Sovos, all employees are encouraged to bring their whole selves to work.*
**Company Background**
 Sovos is a global provider of tax, compliance and trust solutions and services that enable businesses to navigate an increasingly regulated world with true confidence. Purpose-built for always-on compliance capabilities, our scalable IT-driven solutions meet the demands of an evolving and complex global regulatory landscape. Sovos’ cloud-based software platform provides an unparalleled level of integration with business applications and government compliance processes.
   

  

 More than 100,000 customers in 100+ countries – including half the Fortune 500 – trust Sovos for their compliance needs. Sovos annually processes more than three billion transactions across 19,000 global tax jurisdictions. Bolstered by a robust partner program more than 400 strong, Sovos brings to bear an unrivaled global network for companies across industries and geographies. Founded in 1979, Sovos has operations across the Americas and Europe, and is owned by Hg and TA Associates. For more information visit http://www.sovos.com and follow us on LinkedIn and Twitter.

title: Head of Origination
description:
Are you ready to play a pivotal role in the green transition and make a substantial impact in the energy sector? Do you thrive in a dynamic, fast-paced environment where your efforts drive meaningful change? If so, this opportunity might be your ideal fit.
 



  





**Join Us to Drive the Green Transition** 




 Electrification and the shift to fossil-free energy present tremendous opportunities for individuals, companies, and society. However, these changes also pose significant challenges, particularly for our energy system. Ingrid Capacity, an energy tech company founded in 2022, is dedicated to overcoming some of the toughest obstacles in the green transition through innovative technology and pioneering software development. We develop and optimize flexible energy assets, such as large-scale battery energy storage, to store electricity when there is a surplus and return it when there is a shortage. This ensures grid stability, increases the adoption of renewable energy sources like wind and solar, and maximizes grid utilization cost-effectively.
 



 Currently, Ingrid Capacity is experiencing rapid growth, through the expansion of energy storage in Sweden and further international expansion on the horizon. We have approximately 200 MW under construction, over 200 MW entering the construction phase, and a development pipeline exceeding 7 GW across Europe. Our headquarters are located in Stockholm, Sweden.
 



  





**About the Role** 




 As the Head of Origination, you will play a crucial role in Ingrid Capacity’s growth across Europe. You will manage the origination of revenue streams, overcome challenges, mitigate risk and give clear insight into future strategic opportunities.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* **Energy Portfolio Leadership:** 
 Build and lead the Energy Portfolio function, including recruiting team members over time.
* **Contract Origination:** 
 Lead the origination of capacity contracts with public and private counterparties in target markets. Maximise revenue streams through originating contracts to help further grow pipeline.
* **Contract Negotiation:** 
 Structure and negotiate bankable contracts, taking into consideration the characteristics of underlying physical assets and asset portfolios.
* **Client Relationships:** 
 Build and maintain strong relationships with key clients, counterparties and offtakers in target markets.
* **Revenue Strategies:** 
 Work closely with the Energy Trading team in building and assessing revenue strategies on an ongoing basis.
* **Strategic Support:** 
 Work closely with the Executive teams when entering into new projects and markets to support investment decisions.
* **Analytical Approach:** 
 Lead an analytical approach in assessing risk-adjusted return profiles of various revenue strategies.
* **Client Interaction:** 
 Handle the initial interaction with new clients, to the finalization and closing of contracts.
* **Proposal Development:** 
 Develop compelling proposals for tenders, liaising with Ingrid Capacity’s internal teams.
* **Project Customization:** 
 Working closely with internal and external teams to tailor the best solution for each client.



  





**Your Experience and Skills:** 



* University degree in a relevant field such as finance, business, engineering, or management.
* Over 10 years of experience in energy trading, development, energy portfolio management, or origination and structuring of complex energy projects or energy sales agreements (e.g., PPAs, CFDs).
* Proven track record of working at a senior level within a leading energy business in Europe. Preference for experience in Nordic market and in Germany.
* Fluent in English, both verbal and written.



  





**Personal Attributes:** 



* Outgoing and driven personality, excited about breaking new ground in the energy transition space.
* Proven ability to build long-lasting relationships with partners and clients.
* Analytical mindset, curious, capable of connecting the dots between assets, finance, and power markets.



  





**What We Offer** 




 At Ingrid Capacity, we are not just employees; we are pioneers, visionaries, and catalysts for change. We stand at the forefront of the global energy transition, committed to shaping the future of power generation. Our company is more than a workplace; it is a platform for innovation where bold ideas become reality.
 



 We believe that the foundation of a successful company lies in its culture. At Ingrid Capacity, we understand that building a thriving organization requires more than technology and innovation; it requires a culture rooted in trust, growth, and learning from mistakes. We prioritize the well-being of our colleagues, offering regular social activities and group training classes to create a workplace where everyone can thrive.
 



  





**Application** 




 Does this sound like a match? We welcome you to apply! Selections will be made on an ongoing basis, and we will finalize the recruitment once we find the perfect match. Please do not wait to submit your application.
 



 Our recruitment partner, Green Recruitment Company, is managing the process, and the lead recruiter is Charlie Wilkens Green (charlie@greenrecruitmentcompany.com). Please note that applications are only accepted through the link provided.
 



  





 We look forward to hearing from you!
 



 /Team Ingrid Capacity

title: Client Value Partner - Pharma & Life-Sciences
description:
We're Celonis, the global leader in Process Mining technology and one of the world's fastest-growing SaaS firms. We believe there is a massive opportunity to unlock productivity by placing data and intelligence at the core of business processes - and for that, we need you to join us.
   

  

**The Team:**
 We're Celonis, the global leader in Process Mining technology and one of the world's fastest-growing SaaS firms. We believe there is a massive opportunity to unlock productivity by placing data and intelligence at the core of business processes - and for that, we need you to join us.
   

  

**The Role:**
 The Client Value Partner (CVP) role is a key addition to our broader Value Engineering team and will play a crucial role in Celonis’ growth strategy. As a CVP, you will spearhead our mission of data-driven business transformation with our most strategic customers (Likely 1-3 G2K customers). You will lead extensive teams of Celonis experts to ensure the success and satisfaction of some of our top customer base on their journey to realizing value with Celonis.
   

  

 The CVP will be the primary accountable lead and trusted advisor, dedicated to driving value for the assigned account patch. This involves engaging with C-Level Executives to collaboratively define the long-term vision for utilizing Celonis to transform their business while mobilizing the necessary Celonis resources. Supported by the Celonis cross-functional teams, you will drive measurable business impact across various processes, functions and business areas and accelerate the adoption of our platform. The CVP will also champion transformational initiatives across Celonis and customer accounts, fostering innovation and strategic change to maximize value and drive business transformation.
   

  

 We seek experienced professionals with a proven track record in leading cross functional teams, managing executive relationships, driving profitable growth, and blending deep process and industry expertise with strong analytical and consulting skills. Join us at the forefront of one of the fastest-growing tech companies worldwide and help guide our customers to become the next Lighthouse Celonis customers.
   

  

**The work you’ll do:**
**Accountable Program Lead & Engagement Manager**
* Develop and maintain strong relationships with key stakeholders, including C-level internal/external executives, embedding Celonis into their strategic objectives.
* Ensure engagements are properly staffed, leveraging resources from global cross-functional Celonis teams, such as Servicing, Product & Engineering
* Mentor customers on organization design and maturation of Centers of Excellence to focus on increasing adoption of our platform
* Mentor and coach team members, providing guidance and support for their success, and offer feedback to managers on team performance.


**Driving Customer Value**
* Responsible for the end-to-end customer value journey (landing, expanding, adoption and renewing)
* Influence key customer stakeholders through executive communication, product knowledge, and industry/domain expertise.
* Work with senior stakeholders to establish the Celonis program roadmap and detailed value plans.
* Drive value realization and adoption within accounts, ensuring high-quality, on-time project completion, client satisfaction, and meeting usage and adoption targets.


**Community Builder and Customer Advocacy**
* Organize and lead customer advisory boards to address industry-specific challenges and innovations, establishing a structured feedback loop to continuously gather insights and improve products and services.
* Act as the voice of the customer within the company, ensuring alignment of product development and service offerings with industry needs and customer feedback, while collaborating with the customer advocacy team on advocacy strategies.
* Drive customer presence and sponsorship at key Celonis and industry events, serving as a Celonis leader at conferences, webinars, and through published thought leadership.
* Collaborate on innovation or new asset development in specific domains, and contribute to playbooks, resources, and tools for the value engineering team to enhance their effectiveness.


**The qualifications you need:**
* Minimum 10 years of relevant customer success, strategy consulting, or related experience in Industry required.
* Strong experience in driving large scale transformation programs, process re-engineering engagements, and implementations
* Strong experience working for or within the Pharma & Life-Sciences space, being familiar with current challenges, strategic direction, and ongoing initiatives. Strong existing network is a plus.
* Extensive experience in achieving business objectives through the deployment of software solutions
* Ability to navigate large global organizations and have the power of persuasion through data, facts and confidence
* Knows how to successfully work with internal resources to design, pitch and sell opportunities with relevant subject matter experts and practice leads
* Possess a natural and consultative approach when engaging with senior executives
* Strong team player who inspires the team with a patient and entrepreneurial leadership style
* Project management: ability to organize and manage multiple streams
* Strong communication skills and ability to translate Celonis use cases into customer business landscape
* Are self-motivated, proactive team player
* Are able to thrive in fast-paced, collaborative, and ambiguous environments with various stakeholders
* Be willing to travel to meet with customer stakeholder needs (25%)


**What Celonis can offer you:**
* The unique opportunity to work with industry-leading process mining technology
* Investment in your personal growth and skill development (clear career paths, internal mobility opportunities, L&D platform, mentorships, and more)
* Great compensation and benefits packages (equity (restricted stock units), life insurance, time off, generous leave for new parents from day one, and more). For intern and working student benefits, click here.
* Physical and mental well-being support (subsidized gym membership, access to counseling, virtual events on well-being topics, and more)
* A global and growing team of Celonauts from diverse backgrounds to learn from and work with
* An open-minded culture with innovative, autonomous teams
* Business Resource Groups to help you feel connected, valued and seen (Black@Celonis, Women@Celonis, Parents@Celonis, Pride@Celonis, Resilience@Celonis, and more)
* A clear set of company values that guide everything we do: Live for Customer Value, The Best Team Wins, We Own It, and Earth Is Our Future


**About Us**
 Since 2011, Celonis has helped thousands of the world's largest and most valued companies deliver immediate cash impact, radically improve customer experience and reduce carbon emissions. Its Process Intelligence platform uses industry-leading process mining technology and AI to present companies with a living digital twin of their end-to-end processes. For the first time, everyone in an organisation has a common language about how the business works, visibility into where value is hidden and the ability to capture it. Celonis is headquartered in Munich (Germany) and New York (USA) and has more than 20 offices worldwide.
   

  

 Get familiar with the Celonis Process Intelligence Platform by watching this video.
   

  

 Join us as we make processes work for people, companies and the planet.
   

  

 Celonis is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. Different makes us better.
   

  

 Accessibility and Candidate Notices

title: SAP SuccessFactors-konsult
description:
**SAP SuccessFactors-konsult till vår nordiska SAP-grupp**
 Har du en passion för att tranformera företag med de senaste teknologierna och göra dem datadrivna? Letar du efter en plats där du kan kombinera dina färdigheter inom affärsrådgivning med teknikkunskaper? Då är vår roll som SAP SuccessFactors-konsult något som kommer passa dig!
   

  

 Bidra med din unika talang och passion till oss på Accenture, och hjälp oss att uppfylla löftet om teknik och mänsklig uppfinningsrikedom. Ta chansen att utveckla dina färdigheter och bygga en spännande karriär med starka framtidsutsikter. Du kommer att spela en viktig roll i att omvandla företag och organisationer runt om i världen för att möta dagens och morgondagens utmaningar. Var en del av förändringen!
   

  

**Om vår Nordiska SAP-grupp**
 Accenture och SAP har ett långvarigt partnerskap som sträcker sig till över 40 år. Som den ledande nordiska SAP-transformationspartnern arbetar vi med alltifrån rådgivning, till systemimplementation och teknikinnovation. Tillsammans revolutionerar vi framtiden för affärslivet genom stora SAP-transformationsprogram med några av de viktigaste företagenpå marknaden.
   

  

 Inom vår nordiska SAP-grupp arbetar vi med de senaste SAP-lösningarna och erbjudandena som SAP SuccessFactors, SAP S/4 HANA Cloud, SAP CX, Ariba, SAP BTP och SAP RISE.
   

  

 Vi är nu ute efter att fortsätta expandera vår SAP HXM-gruppering och söker kandidater för flera positioner och senioritetsnivåer.
   

  

 För att läsa mer om våra SAP-tjänster, besök oss på https://www.accenture.com/us-en/services/sap-index.
   

  

**Vad vi erbjuder** 
**:**
- Arbeta med några av de största SAP-kunderna i stora globala implementationer.

- Var en del av innovativa SAP-transformationsprojekt.

- Ges betydande utvecklingsmöjligheter och stöd för framsteg i din professionella karriär.

- Utveckla din affärsförståelse, konsultverktygslåda, tekniska och professionella färdigheter.

- Få tillgång till omfattande verktyg och ramverk som stöds av vår globala organisation, inklusive implementationsmetodologier, kunskapsdatabaser, branschledande tilläggsmjukvara, expertnätverk och benchmarking.

- Jobba med en dedikerad mentor som vägleder dig under ditt arbete med kontinuerlig feedback.

- Vara en del av vår kultur och kärnvärderingar i vårt initativ “truly human” för en balanserad arbetsmiljö.

- Använd din funktionella och tekniska expertis inom SuccessFactors/HCM genom att analysera, utforma och implementera affärsprocesser som stöds av de senaste SAP-lösningarna.

- Använd din branschkunskap inom SAP-lösningar för att leverera kundvärde som en professionell individ och som en del av ett team.

- Delta i vårt högt engagerade och mångfaldiga globala nätverk för samarbete och leverans.

- Erhålla konkurrenskraftig ersättning och förmåner.

- Hjälp kunders hållbarhetsagenda genom SAP-transformeringar.

- Bli en värdefull medlem av vårt Nordiska SAP SuccessFactors-grupp och bidra till innovation, ledarskap, kompetensutveckling och försäljningsutveckling.

**Vem vi letar efter:**
 För att vara framgångsrik som SAP SuccessFactors-konsult rekommenderas det att du har:
   

  

*Obligatoriska kvalifikationer*
- Minst 2+ år av praktisk erfarenhet av SAP i en roll i en projektgrupp (helst i Norden).

- Minst 2+ år av erfarenhet av SAP-implementering i SAP SuccessFactors.

- Viljan att forma och arbeta i ett teamorienterad miljö.

- Motiverad, ihärdig, ivrig att optimera, sträva efter excellens.

- Passionerad för SuccessFactors, HXM och HR, innovation och att leverera den senaste teknikerna till dina kunder.

- Du är en analytisk problemlösare med stor kompetens inom SuccessFactors-applikationen och förstår klientens HR-verksamhet väl.

- En eller flera SAP-certifiering(-ar) inom SuccessFactors (t ex, inom Employee Central/Recruitment/Compensation/Talent Management/Analytics/Integration & Migration).

- Utmärkta kommunikationsfärdigheter (muntlig och skriftlig) och presentationsfärdigheter för att nå ut till tekniska och icke-tekniska målgrupper på engelska.

- Stark vilja att ta sig an problem, identifiera källan och föreslå möjliga lösningar i samarbete med andra teammedlemmar.

- En relevant kandidat- eller masterexamen.

- Vi rekryterar på olika nivåer. För chefsnivå och högre ser vi gärna att du har minst 7 års relevant projekterfarenhet, samt har lett ett team, och idealiskt sett också varit involverad i att sälja nya projekt sedan tidigare.

*Meriterande kvalifikationer*
- Funktionell HR-domänserfarenhet.

- Erfarenhet av att leverera projekt från början till slut som en teammedlem eller ledare över ett arbetsflöde.

- Erfarenhet av flera genomförda implementeringslivscykler, inklusive workbook design, kundprocess workshops, systemkonfiguration och testning samt rådgivning av klientlösningar.

- Flera SAP-certifieringar inom SAP SuccessFactors inom vissa områden (som Talent Acquisition eller Core HR).

- Kompetens inom närbesläktade områden som SAP HCM, Fieldglass, Work Zone, CPI, Datamigrering, Tid & Lön, etc, är också meriterande.

- Stödja försäljningsmöjligheter inklusive förslag och muntliga presentationer.

- Djup affärs- och branscherfarenhet inom en eller flera branscher.

- Nordiska språkkunskaper (danska, norska, svenska eller finska), beroende på anställning.

**Plats:**
**Stockholm, Göteborg och Malmö**
 Accenture välkomnar och uppmuntrar ansökningar från en mångfald av bakgrunder relaterade till kön, ålder, etnicitet, kultur, ras, religion och tro, funktionshinder, nationalitet, sexuell läggning och könsidentitet. Inkludering och mångfald är grundläggande för vår kultur och våra kärnvärden, och skapar en miljö där alla bidrar med unika erfarenheter, talanger och kulturer till sitt arbete. Vi bjuder in dig att vara en del av denna mångfald!
   

  

 Please note that due to the summer season, our hiring process may be slower than usual. We apologize for any delay in responding to your applications. Rest assured, we are committed to reviewing each application thoroughly. We apprciate your patience during this time.

title: Nyexaminerad jurist till Banking & Finance i Stockholm
description:
**Om oss**
 Linklaters är en internationell ledande affärsjuridisk advokatbyrå med huvudkontor i London. Med över 5600 anställda och 31 kontor är vi etablerade i alla stora affärs- och finanscentra och kan erbjuda våra klienter förstklassig juridisk rådgivning världen över.
   

  

 Vårt Stockholmskontor fokuserar på komplex transaktionsrådgivning inom M&A, Private Equity och Banking & Finance och arbetar integrerat med Linklaters övriga kontor världen över. Hos oss utvecklar du din affärsjuridiska kompetens och bygger ett starkt lokalt och internationellt nätverk, samtidigt som du bistår våra klienter i deras mest komplexa transaktioner och ärenden. Läs mer om Linklaters på www.linklaters.com.
   

  

**Arbetsbeskrivning**
 Till vår arbetsgrupp Banking & Finance söker vi dig som vill arbeta i team på en internationell byrå med tydligt transaktionsfokus. Vi söker dig som nyligen har tagit examen från juristprogrammet med goda akademiska meriter. Du har mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska. Servicekänsla, noggrannhet och god analytisk förmåga är också av stor vikt. Du är en positiv och öppen person som är intresserad av att lära dig och av att bidra till både verksamhetens och din personliga utveckling.
   

  

**Vårt erbjudande**
 Du erbjuds en spännande tjänst på en internationell ledande advokatbyrå där det finns stora möjligheter till utveckling. Du får dagligen arbeta i en internationell miljö med topprankade jurister och marknadens mest komplexa ärenden, både i Stockholm och runt om i världen. Vi är en innovativ byrå och det finns möjligheter att utvecklas och engagera sig inom många olika områden såsom Legal Tech, ESG och CSR. Vid årsskiftet flyttar vi till helt nya lokaler i centralt läge på Jakobsbergsgatan 24.
   

  

 Linklaters erbjuder generösa anställningsförmåner. Detta innefattar ett brett utbud av globala utbildningar, vilket ger dig ett unikt och mycket eftertraktat utbildningspaket. Genom att arbeta hos oss lär du snabbt känna kollegor från våra andra kontor runtom i världen och kan bygga upp ett internationellt nätverk som varar livet ut. Detta möjliggörs även genom några av våra olika varianter av secondment där du får arbeta på något av våra övriga kontor. Du får även tidig exponering mot klienter och ansvar att leda stora transaktioner. Detta är möjligt med vår unika plattform som kommer träna och stötta dig i din karriär.
   

  

 För att söka tjänsten skickar du in ditt CV, personliga brev och studieintyg omgående då vi anställer löpande. Start februari 2025.
   

  

 För frågor om tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta:
   

  

 Eleonore Häger, Head of HR via eleonore.hager@linklaters.com
   

  

**Technical Skills**
**This list of duties and responsibilities above is not exhaustive. It is intended to describe the general content of, and requirements for, the performance of this job. As such, the role may also include the undertaking of additional tasks as required.**

title: Senior Broadcast & OLV Planner
description:
*Publicis Groupe is one of the largest communications groups in the world. We are building the agency model of the future and take a holistic approach to our clients’ challenges. By fusing together our media, creative, data and technology expertise, we are able to provide clients with integrated solutions, transformative ideas and compelling consumer experiences. We call it the Power of One.* 




  





*We are proud winner of many awards and nominations, both in Sweden and internationally. But nothing makes us prouder than to work with clients and brands such as Disney, Elgiganten, Mondelez, Volvo, VISA, Lantmännen, Nomad Foods, Lactalis, Midsona, Renault and many more.* 




  





*At Publicis, we put our people first. We are proud to be certified by Great Place to Work (2022, 2023, 2024), and have been recognized with a Magnet Award for our engaging culture (2023). Our goal is to become the leading workplace in our industry. We are based in a fantastic office in Odenplan, but also offer a flexible work policy.* 




  





**Job Description** 




  





 Are you eager to thrive in an exciting, multi-faceted role where focus on people, creativity, development and business lies at the core? Do you want to work in an inclusive organization based on values of kindness, curiosity, courage and collaboration? In that case, we could be a good match for you.
 



  





**About this role** 




  





 In your role as a Broadcast Planner, you have the responsibility for media strategies, negotiations, planning, optimization, buying, follow-up and campaign management for your clients within TV/online video/radio/audio & cinema. As you are responsible for the day-to-day contact with our clients you routinely build and maintain great business relationships.
 



  





 In the Broadcast department, our mission is to contribute with unique and competitive knowledge and competence regarding all matters relating to moving image and sound, regardless of platform. We are specialists in our field and always have the ambition to offer the market's best skills based on our knowledge and experience. We focus on quality and creativity, and challenge and drive development both for our clients and with the media. Currently, we are a team with different backgrounds and knowledge working towards a common goal: to create the best TV/online video/radio/audio & cinema campaigns for all our clients.
 



  





**Qualifications** 




  





 We are looking for someone who...
 


* Has excellent analytical skills
* Has the ability to adapt to a changing environment and handle multiple priorities
* Is a fast learner when it comes to new systems and has demonstrable skills with word processing software, spreadsheets, and presentations
* Is skilled in customer interaction, problem-solving, negotiation, and communication, which will help us deliver unparalleled service that keeps our customers coming back
* Is able to communicate cleary and inspire others in Swedish as well as in English
* Knowledge in Marathon and TechEdge experience a plus



  





 We place high value on your ability to work in a structured manner with an optimistic, solution-oriented attitude. Preferably you have worked as a broadcast specialist at an agency, or the equivalent at a marketing department on the client side.
 



  





 In order to thrive in this role we also believe that you:
 


* Are supportive, daring, engaged and responsible. You value collaboration and have a collective mindset
* Are able to identify possibilities and solutions
* Like to work both strategically and operatively in a fast-paced environment



  





**Additional Information** 




  





 In addition to a welcoming culture and inclusive environment with passionate colleagues we offer you:
 


* **Career Opportunities** 
 ; Local and Global opportunities through the Power Of One.
* **Personal and Professional Learning** 
 ; Global AI learning platform where you can participate in +30 000 classes and connect with colleagues from all over the world.
* **Flexible Ways of Working** 
 ; We want to be an employer where work life balance is cherished. We love to spend time with our colleagues at the office but also believe in the output of your work not where the work is being done.
* **Work Your World** 
 ; For six weeks a year, the world is yours. Every employee can work anywhere on the planet where there's a Publicis office. A new city, a favorite locale, or even a different country - Go. Grow. Explore.
* **Mental Health** 
 ; The happiness and health of our people is paramount to us. We work continuously on maintaining a healthy and safe working environment through initiatives that facilitate the well-being of our employees.
* **Benefits** 
 ; Generous benefit package.



  





 We look forward to your application!

title: Finance Manager Sweden
description:
**Join us today and make a difference in people's lives!**
 This position is a key role within the Finance Department making sure all reporting (managerial and statutory) is made timely and accurately in respect of Company policy and local regulations. It requires the ability to pro actively work with a large degree of autonomy, ensuring all business critical items are actioned and all deadlines are adhered to. Excellent communication with suppliers, staff (particularly via Telephone, Teams & email) and colleagues is critical to the successful undertaking of this role, as well as keeping the Head of R2R informed of all pertinent aspects and maintaining the LivaNova mantra of operating in a no surprise environment.
   

  

**Essential Job Functions**
 Accounting review
   

  

 OneStream reporting
   

  

 Business Performance Reporting
   

  

 Budget&RF
   

  

 Capex reporting
   

  

 COGS reconciliation
   

  

 Company cars
   

  

 BAM Administration
   

  

 Compliance & Sox
   

  

 SAP PR
   

  

 PR Control
   

  

 Intrastat
   

  

 Tax mgt & reporting
   

  

 Monthly closing review
   

  

 MJE reporting
   

  

 Financial Statements
   

  

 Local reporting
   

  

 Audit Queries
   

  

 Accruals & Prepayments
   

  

 Pension postings
   

  

 Payroll accruals
   

  

 Cost center mngt/KSV5
   

  

 Transit account mgt
   

  

 F.05 - FX revaluation
   

  

 Inventory reporting/ postings
   

  

 Lease accounting/reconc
   

  

 Monthly closing
   

  

 Revenue recognition
   

  

 Service contracts
   

  

 Lease contract
   

  

**Knowledge, Skills And Abilities Required**
* Good knowledge of the English language
* Communication: Excellent communicator across all levels of the organisation and with external customers.
* Interpersonal: Must be a team player, self-motivated, reliable and proactive, with the ability to take the initiative where necessary.
* Results Orientation: Excellent organisational skills are essential. Must be able to prioritise work effectively in response to rapidly changing circumstances. Is able to work under pressure, with tight deadlines, remaining courteous and professional at all times.
* Competent P.C User: Prior SAP experience preferred but not essential, must have high competence in the use of Excel and be proficient in all other elements of the Microsoft Office suite (including email). It is essential to have a detailed working knowledge of accounting system software.


**Education**
 Bachelor's Degree - Accounting Qualification
   

  

**Experience**
 5 years post qualification experience, or a minimum of 10 years similar work experience.
   

  

**Our Commitment To Diversity & Inclusion**
*LivaNova values equality and celebrates diversity. We are committed to ensuring that our recruitment process is fair, transparent and free from unlawful discrimination.*
*Our selection process is driven by the key demands/requirements for the role rather than bias or discrimination on the basis of a candidate’s sex, gender identity, age, marital status, veteran status, non-job-related disability/handicap or medical condition, family status, sexual orientation, religion, color, ethnicity, race or any other legally protected classification.*
**Notice To Third Party Agencies**
*Please note that we do not accept unsolicited resumes from recruiters or employment agencies. In the absence of a signed Recruitment Services Agreement, we will not consider, or agree to, payment of any referral compensation or recruiter fee. In the event that a recruiter or agency submits a resume or candidate without a previously signed agreement, we explicitly reserve the right to pursue and hire those candidate(s) without any financial obligation to the recruiter or agency.*
**Beware Of Job Scams**
 Please beware of potentially fraudulent job postings or suspicious recruiting activity by persons posing as LivaNova recruiters or employees. The scammers may attempt to solicit confidential, personal information, such as a social security number, or your financial information. LivaNova will never ask for fees prior/during/after the application process, nor will we ask for banking details or personal financial information in return for the assurance of employment. If you are concerned that an offer of employment might be a scam or that the recruiter is not legitimate, please verify by searching for “See Open Jobs” on https://www.livanova.com/en-us/careers, and check that all recruitment emails come from an @livanova.com email address.

title: Dataskyddsansvarig till IF Metall
description:
Jurist
   

  

 Dataskyddsansvarig till IF Metall
   

  

 Har du erfarenhet av arbete inom dataskydd och trivs i en roll med många kontakter? Vill du arbeta i en värderingsstyrd organisation tillsammans med engagerade kollegor där du gör skillnad?
   

  

 Nu söker IF Metall en dataskyddsansvarig till en utvecklingsorienterad roll. Här får du möjlighet att jobba med allt från strategier, kunskapsspridning och utbildning till uppföljning som berör hela organisationens integritets- och informationshantering. IF Metall har över 300 000 medlemmar på 13 000 arbetsplatser runt om i Sverige.
   

  

 Tjänsten omfattar heltid och är en tillsvidareanställning med placering på förbundskontoret i centrala Stockholm. Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

**Ansök Via Länken Nedan**
 https://www.ifmetall.se/om-oss/lediga-tjanster/dataskyddsansvarig-till-if-metall/
   

  

 Om tjänsten
   

  

 I tjänsten som dataskyddsansvarig kommer du ha en central roll inom IF Metall att utveckla och samordna förbundets verksamhet att uppfylla kraven i EU:s dataskyddsförordning och kompletterande lagstiftning inom integritetsskyddet. Du kommer arbeta brett över hela verksamheten och bygga ett effektivt dataskyddsarbete i samarbete med dataskyddsansvarig, dataskyddsombud, dataskyddskoordinatorer, verksamhetsansvariga och medarbetare. I samarbetet ingår också informationssäkerhetsansvarig och informationsförvaltare.
   

  

 Du arbetar nära dataskyddsansvarig och dataskyddsombudet och du rapporterar till förbundets ekonomichef. Som dataskyddsansvarig har du ett beredningsansvar och i vissa frågor ett beslutsansvar. Rollen ingår i IF Metalls IT-råd. IT-rådet arbetar bland annat som rådgivare till förbundsstyrelsen och ansvarar för att förbundets dataskyddsstrategi och IT-strategi genomförs.
   

  

**Dataskyddsansvariges Arbetsuppgifter Kommer Bland Annat Vara Att**
 – Administrera åtgärder som är kopplade till dataskyddsombudets kontrollplan och rapporter
   

  

 – Hantera personuppgiftsincidenter
   

  

 – Teckna och uppdatera biträdesavtal och inbördes arrangemang sant utreda personuppgiftsansvarig i olika samarbeten
   

  

 – Uppdatera integritetspolicyn med utgångspunkt i kartläggningen av förbundets arbetsprocesser
   

  

 – Genomföra konsekvensbedömningar
   

  

 – Uppdatera behandlingsregistret
   

  

 – Hantera de registrerades rättigheter
   

  

 – Genomföra utbildningar
   

  

 – Upprätta och uppdatera relevanta styrdokument och arbetsrutiner
   

  

 – Delta i IF Metalls IT-råd
   

  

 – Delta i förbundsstyrelseberedningens och förbundsstyrelsens möten i beslutsärenden inom dataskydd
   

  

 – Följa upp dataskyddsarbetet och löpande stämma av med dataskyddsombudet, ekonomichefen, verksamhetsansvariga och dataskyddskoordinatorer
   

  

 Tillträde enligt överenskommelse, löne- och anställningsvillkor är enligt avtal för tjänstemän.
   

  

 Facklig företrädare: Tommy Thunberg Bertolone, 08-786 81 46
   

  

 Vem är du?
   

  

 Vi söker dig som har arbetat i en liknande roll med mycket god kunskap om och erfarenhet av att arbeta med dataskyddslagstiftningen. Du har juristutbildning eller annan dokumenterad juridisk kompetens inom GDPR. Du ska kunna ge rättsligt stöd och utföra rättsutredningar vid behov. Rollen kräver att du har deltagit i förändringsarbete kopplat till integritetsskyddsfrågor. Vidare har du god förmåga att administrera och samordna omfattande åtgärder, till exempel genom erfarenhet av projektledning. Har du erfarenhet av arbete i en facklig organisation är det meriterande och detsamma gäller erfarenhet av att arbeta i idéburen eller medlemsstyrd organisation. Du har goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska såväl i tal som i skrift då du bland annat kommer att arbeta med styrdokument, utbildningsmaterial och rapporter.
   

  

 För att lyckas i rollen bör du vara resultatinriktad och lyhörd för de behov av stöd som finns i olika delar av verksamheten. Du har förmågan att hjälpa andra att växa samt kan agera professionellt och förtroendeingivande. Vidare är du kommunikativ och pedagogisk med förmåga att stärka och skapa goda relationer. Du arbetar strukturerat, är intresserad av strategiska frågor och gillar problemlösning. Vi söker dig som delar arbetarrörelsens värderingar och trivs med ett varierande arbete som du själv har stora möjligheter att forma och utveckla. I tjänsten ingår resor, främst nationellt till våra avdelningar men även till konferenser och utbildningar som är relevanta för rollen som dataskyddsansvarig.
   

  

 Om verksamheten
   

  

 IF Metall organiserar anställda inom verkstads-, bil- och kemiindustrin, gruvor, läkemedelsföretag och tvätterier, och har över 300 000 medlemmar på 13 000 arbetsplatser runt om i Sverige. Omkring 21 procent av medlemmarna är kvinnor. IF Metall har en feministisk syn och verkar för rättvisa, jämlikhet och jämställdhet. Hos oss har alla samma värde – oavsett ålder, kön, ursprung eller sexuell läggning. IF Metalls ledord är jämlikhet, solidaritet och frihet!
   

  

 Läs mer på: ifmetall.se

title: Chef Praktikertjänst Vård
description:
**Information om arbetsplatsen**
 Praktikertjänst Vård är Praktikertjänsts centrala förvärvs- och driftsorganisation inom hälso- och sjukvård. Affärsområdet består av 21 mottagningar fördelade på 13 primärvårdsmottagningar och åtta rehabmottagningar. Primärvårdsmottagningarna återfinns i åtta av landets regioner medan samtliga rehabmottagningar ligger i Stockholm. Kontoret ligger på Adolf Fredriks kyrkogata 9 i Stockholm.
   

  

 Affärsområdet startade 2021, omsätter idag ca 700 milj kronor och består av ca 725 medarbetare. Totalt har vi ansvaret för ca 110 000 listade patienter och varje år genomförs ca 220 000 patientbesök på våra rehabmottagningar.
   

  

**Arbetsuppgifter**
 Ledningsgruppen för Praktikertjänst Vård består av åtta personer: chef, regionchefer, verksamhetsutvecklare, koordinator/chefsass, koordinator/kvalitetsass samt HR-stöd. Affärsområdet sorterar in under Affärsutveckling i bolaget och ses som en tillväxtmotor för Praktikertjänst som helhet.
   

  

 Rollen innefattar bl a
   

  

* Resultatansvar
* Medarbetaransvar för ledningsgruppen samt övergripande ansvar för samtliga medarbetare i affärsområdet
* Budget- och prognosarbete
* Operativ drift
* Återkommande resultatgenomgång inför koncernledning och i förekommande fall styrelse
* Förvärvsarbete vid propåer från säljare. Visst aktivt arbete med identifiering och uppsökande kontakt av nya potentiella förvärvsmöjligheter kan förekomma
* Avtalsförhandlingar
* Återkommande resor till och besök på våra mottagningar
* Affärsområdets kontaktperson med Praktikertjänst övriga centrala funktioner såsom HR, kvalitet, IT etc
* Sammankallande och ansvarig för t ex verksamhetschefsdagar


**Kvalifikationer**
 För att lyckas i denna roll behöver du tidigare i ditt yrkesliv ha drivit en storskalig verksamhet på nationell nivå, alternativt framgångsrikt ha drivit en mottagning inom primärvård i någon form. Du är van vid att hantera regioner och offentliga aktörer.
   

  

**Personliga egenskaper**
 Du har en synnerligen god förståelse för vikten av ett seniort ledarskap där du sömlöst kan blanda både det hårda och det mjuka, beroende på situation. Du behöver vidare vara resultatorienterad, vara bra med människor och även kunna hantera och navigera i en stor organisation runtom kring dig. Du besitter en stor portion ödmjukhet och självkännedom, samtidigt som du har mod att fatta dina egna beslut utan att alltid eftersträva konsensus.
   

  

**Övrig information**
 Du rapporterar till Chef Affärsutveckling.
   

  

 Vi tar enbart emot ansökningar via annonsen och kommer inte kunna besvara frågor via mail eller telefon. Praktikertjänst sköter rekryteringen av denna tjänst själva, varför vi i detta läge undanber oss kontakt från rekryteringsbolag.
   

  

**Om Praktikertjänst**
 Praktikertjänst startade för över 60 år sedan och är en av Sveriges största vårdgivare. Vi har 750 mottagningar, från Vittangi i norr till Ystad i söder, som drivs av praktiker som tillsammans äger hela Praktikertjänst. Vi är övertygade om att det skapar engagemang, delaktighet, fokus på kvalitet, kontinuitet samt kompetensutveckling - och är en viktig anledning till att vi varje år hamnar i topp vad gäller både nöjda patienter och medarbetare. Hos oss får du en trygg anställning med fina förmåner och goda möjligheter till både personlig och professionell utveckling. Vi vet att våra medarbetares välbefinnande är grunden till nöjda patienter och i det långa loppet, ett mer välmående samhälle.

title: Regulatory Liaison Counsel - ISVs and Embedded Partners
description:
**Build your future with Sovos.**
 If you're seeking a career where innovation meets impact, you've come to the right place. As a global leader, Sovos is transforming tax compliance from a business requirement to a force for growth while revolutionising how businesses navigate the ever-changing regulatory landscape.
   

  

 At Sovos, we're dedicated to more than just solving compliance challenges – we're committed to making a positive and lasting difference in everything we do. Our teams operate on the modern edge of digital technology, working not only to solve complex business challenges but also to enrich our personal, professional, and local communities.
