Därför erbjuder vi dig möjligheten att lägga upp en individuell utbildningsplan, där vi bekostar såväl studiematerial som själva certifieringarna. Under din utveckling kommer vi matcha din kompetens mot rätt uppdrag i takt med att du avancerar. Vi genomför regelbundet spännande aktiviteter där du som konsult får möjlighet att träffa och umgås med dina kollegor under roliga och avslappnande former.
   

  

*Mer om oss*
 Centric är ett IT-företag med 380 anställda, med kontor i Stockholm, Göteborg, Malmö, Linköping och Örebro. Vi specialiserar oss på uthyrning av generalister och förmedling av specialister samt erbjuder outsourcing och systemlösningar inom retail. title: Backend Engineer
description:
Svea Solar is on the verge of transforming how we manage energy with just the click of a button. We're here to help our customers make the most of their energy usage while also balancing the energy grid with smart, innovative solutions. To bring this vision to life, we're expanding our engineering team and are on the lookout for our next Backend Engineer.
   

  

 As a Backend Engineer, you'll join our Sunbeam Labs, where we’re creating digital services that range from energy optimization to virtual power plants. You’ll work closely with a talented and energetic team of engineers and domain experts, all focused on building cutting-edge software solutions that make energy optimization a reality for our customers.
   

  

 In this role, you’ll be involved in every stage of the software development lifecycle, from brainstorming ideas to deployment and ongoing maintenance. Since we’re pioneering services that haven’t existed before, there’s plenty of room for discovery and problem-solving! You’ll be working with thousands of connected devices that we control in real-time, based on measurements taken multiple times per second. Your daily challenges might include figuring out how to distribute work among devices, handling AWS datacenter failovers without a hitch, counting milliseconds and megawatts, and even predicting tomorrow’s sunshine.
   

  

 If you love tackling challenges, writing code, and having fun while doing it, this could be the perfect fit for you!
   

  

**Are we a match?**
 At Svea Solar, we’re all about our values, and we want to make sure they resonate with you too. We’re looking for a Backend Engineer who’s not just experienced, but who’s also passionate about end-to-end development. We’re less concerned with how many years you’ve been working and more interested in your skills, mindset, and enthusiasm. You should be comfortable with architecture styles and APIs (like REST or RPC) and have strong communication skills with a proactive attitude.
   

  

**Here’s what we’re looking for:**
* Experience as a Backend Developer (preferably with .NET)
* A solid understanding of architecture styles and APIs
* Great communication skills


**Bonus points if you have:**
* Knowledge of cloud technologies (we use AWS)
* Experience with Kubernetes and Docker


 If this sounds like you, we’d love to meet you! Join us on our mission to revolutionize home energy solutions and create a greener, more sustainable future.

title: Data Analytics Expert
description:
Job Description
 
 We are seeking business-oriented and inquisitive data experts to help our client subdomains become data-driven. You will act as a bridge between the data team and the business, spending 80-90% of your time within the business subdomains (T/C/W).
 



 The role primarily involves Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) and experimentation with datasets. When stakeholders have questions, the Data Analyst (DA) will assist by querying the relevant datasets and creating Power BI dashboards to visualize the insights.
 



 Additionally, metadata enrichment is a key responsibility. We have several datasets that lack proper documentation, so the DA will need to collaborate with subdomain business SMEs to complete the data catalog in Unity Catalog.
 



 Some high-level data engineering tasks are also expected. For instance, the DA may need to transform multiple tables within the Databricks Unity Catalog to create aggregated tables necessary for analysis.
 



 Moreover, the DA will be responsible for building Databricks Genie Rooms for stakeholders.
 


 Qualifications
 * Databricks
* Power BI
* Spark


 Personal Qualities 
   


 To succeed in the assignment as a Data Analytics Expert, we would like you to demonstrate strong communication skills, enabling you to clearly articulate complex data insights to both technical and non-technical stakeholders. Your natural curiosity and proactive approach will drive you to explore data deeply, identify trends, and seek out new insights. Additionally, your problem-solving ability will be crucial in troubleshooting issues and finding effective solutions using data. Finally, a team-oriented mindset is essential, as you will be working closely with both the data team and business stakeholders to achieve shared goals.
 


 Company Descripiton
 
 Our client is a global leading company that manufactures household appliances to make households easier. If you want to be involved in influencing tomorrow's household appliances, then this is the client for you!
   




 When you join JobBusters
 
 As a consultant at JobBusters, you can feel secure with a collective agreement, available consultant managers and committed recruiters. As a consultant, you also get access to our network of exciting companies and clients! For us, it is important that you as a consultant feel comfortable, feel a sense of security and community with us as an employer. We offer an occupational pension, salary change and the option of flexpension. You also get access to our benefits portal, where in addition to wellness allowance you have access to lots of discounts and offers in wellnes, home and leisure, transport, healthcare and much more! Your well-being is of the highest priority for us, and we therefore offer you as an employee Corporate Health Care to deal with all the challenges of everyday life, both at work and in private life.
 


 Salary
 
 As agreed.
 


 Admission and Application
 
 Full time, office hours. Our client wishes to start 2024-09-02 and the assignment is expected to run until 2024-12-31 with possibility of extension. You will be employed by JobBusters as a consultant with our exciting client. Send in your application in English (preferably in Word format) as soon as possible, as interviews take place continuously. Application deadline is 2024-08-30.

title: SCRUM MASTER
description:
Arbetsuppgifter
 




 Vi söker en erfaren Scrum Master eller Agil Projektledare för ett uppdrag hos vår kund inom energisektorn. Uppdraget innebär att driva och strukturera arbetet både inom ett projekt som fokuserar på utvecklingen av en ny anläggningsstruktur och inom ett förvaltningsteam. Du kommer att vara en central figur i att säkerställa att arbetet går framåt genom att stötta teamen, som består av representanter från både IT och verksamheten.
 



 Som Scrum Master/Agil Projektledare kommer du att:
 


* Sätta upp och anpassa strukturen i Azure DevOps, inklusive att skapa och hantera Kanbantavlan.
* Säkerställa att korrekta och tillräckligt detaljerade kort finns på Kanbantavlan för varje sprint.
* Leda dagliga stand-up möten och följa upp arbetet på Kanbantavlan.
* Planera och leda sprintar genom backlog refinement.
* Förbereda och genomföra demos samt leda retrospektiv tillsammans med projekt- och förvaltningsteamet.
* Facilitera och delta i andra möten efter behov.



  




 Kvalifikationer
 



- Du ska tala och skriva svenska och engelska obehindrat.

- Högskole-/universitetsexamen minst 120p/180 hp inom systemvetenskap eller motsvarande kompetens genom minst 5 års relevant arbetslivserfarenhet.

- Certifierad Scrum Master.

- Utbildning i och erfarenhet av Azure DevOps.

- Minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet av att leda, planera och följa upp projekt eller arbete inom IT-system eller digitala tjänster med agila metoder som Kanban, Scrum eller SAFe.

- Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet av att arbeta med Azure DevOps.


**Meriterande erfarenheter** 



* Minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet från arbete med affärssystem/ERP/asset management, exempelvis IFS.
* Minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet av arbete med anläggningsförvaltning, till exempel hos leverantör, entreprenör eller inom projektstöd.






 Personliga egenskaper
   






 För att lyckas i rollen som Scrum Master/Agil Projektledare ser vi gärna att du:
 


* Har god samarbetsförmåga och tar initiativ för att driva arbetet framåt.
* Är flexibel och anpassningsbar efter arbetsbelastning.
* Är utåtriktad och tydlig i din kommunikation, med en ödmjuk attityd som gör att du lätt skapar förtroende.
* Arbetar självständigt och målinriktat, med en fallenhet för administrativa uppgifter.
* Har förmåga att arbeta effektivt både självständigt och i grupp.






 FöretagspresentationVår kund är ett statligt affärsverk som förvaltar stamnätet för elkraften i Sverige. De bedriver även forskning- och utvecklingsprojekt på många områden för att främja ny teknik. Huvudkontoret finns i Stockholm och här behöver man som konsult säkerhetsprövas för de flesta uppdrag.Om oss
 
 JobBusters är ett auktoriserat personaluthyrnings- och rekryteringsföretag som är inriktade mot tjänstemän och har funnits sen 2011. Vi på JobBusters bryr oss om våra konsulter och vårt mål är alltid att bygga långsiktiga relationer med både konsult och kund. Vårt mål är alltid att matcha våra kunders drömkandidat med våra kandidaters drömjobb!
 


 När du blir en av oss
   


 Som konsult hos JobBusters kan du känna dig trygg med ett kollektivavtal i ryggen, tillgängliga konsultchefer och engagerade rekryterare. Du som konsult får även tillgång till vårt nätverk av spännande företag och uppdragsgivare! För oss är det viktigt att du som konsult trivs, känner en trygghet och gemenskap till oss som arbetsgivare. Vi erbjuder tjänstepension, löneväxling och möjlighet till flexpension. Du får även tillgång till vår förmånsportal, där du utöver friskvårdsbidrag har tillgång till mängder av rabatter och erbjudanden inom hälsa, hem och fritid, transport, sjukvård och mycket mer! Ditt välmående är av högsta prioritet för oss och vi erbjuder därför dig som anställd Företagshälsovård för att hantera vardagens alla utmaningar, både på jobbet och i privatlivet.
 


 Lön
   


 Enligt överenskommelse.
 


 Tillträde och ansökan
   


 Heltid, kontorstider. Vår kund önskar start 2024-11-01 och uppdraget förväntas löpa t.o.m. 2025-10.30 med möjlighet till förlängning. Du kommer att vara anställd av JobBusters som konsult hos vår spännande kund. Vi går igenom ansökningarna löpande och i konsultvärlden går processerna oftast snabbt. Rollen kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum, vänta därför inte med att skicka in din ansökan (gärna i Word-format). Sista ansökningsdag är 2024-09-03.

title: Senior Data Engineer
description:
*Hos oss får du arbeta med kollegor och verksamheter som precis som du förstått styrkan i data. Tillsammans med våra kunder skapar vi förutsättningar för bättre beslutsfattande och effektivare organisationer. Vi har en stor efterfråga på vår kompetens och söker nu fler kollegor för att möta morgondagens behov. Vill du arbeta med det senaste inom BI? Sök idag och bli vår kollega!*
**Om rollen**
 Som Data Engineer och konsult hos Knowit får du möjlighet att verka inom hela Data och Analytics-kedjan, från strategi, utveckling, databearbetning och analys, till visualisering. Du får arbeta med tekniska lösningar som ligger i framkant som hjälper våra kunder till ökade insikter och datadrivna beslut. Som konsult får du erfarenhet och kunskap av flera olika branscher och verksamheter.
   

  

 Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter kommer innefatta design, utveckling och underhåll av automatiserade arbetsflöden och pipelines för att hämta, organisera och transformera data från olika källor. I tvärfunktionella team skapar du förutsättningar för dataanalytiker och maskininlärningsingenjörer att bygga stabila analyslösningar genom att se till att data finns på rätt plats, i rätt format och i rätt tid.
   

  

**Om dig**
 Du vill arbeta med tekniken och trivs samtidigt med att kommunicera affärsmöjligheter som ny teknik medför. Du trivs med många kontaktytor och samarbetar gärna med personer från både verksamhet och IT. Som person är du ansvarstagande och uppskattar därför självledarskap. Om du inte varit konsult tidigare, är du nyfiken på att testa denna breda roll. Eftersom våra kunder är både nationella och internationella behöver du kunna svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.
   

  

**Vi söker dig som har minst 5 års relevant erfarenhet och goda kunskaper om:**
* Data pipelines - exempelvis Azure Data factory, DBT, AWS Data pipeline, Microsoft SSIS, SAS DI Studio
* BI ramverk och arkitektur
* Kodning inom exempelvis Python och SQL
* Datalager och datamodellering
* Databashantering
* Agila metoder


**Vi erbjuder**
 … ett team om 45 Data och Analytics-specialister som ser sin arbetsplats som prestigelös, rolig och inspirerande. Hos oss får du en varierande och trygg arbetsmiljö där din kompetensutveckling värdesätts. Vi har kontinuerliga föreläsningar och seminarier där vi delar med oss av vår erfarenhet och vi har en stark gemenskap i form av kontinuerliga träffar för teambuilding, AW, konferensresor och liknande.
   

  

**Ansök redan idag!**
 Kontakta Jesper Senke, ansvarig rekryterare, om du vill veta mer om Knowit och rollen vi kan erbjuda dig. Rekryteringen sker löpande.

title: Agil projektledare/Scrum Master
description:
Vi söker en Agil projektledare/Scrum Master
   

  

 Vi söker nya kollegor som skall agera senior konsult hos vår kund som Agil-projektledare/Scrum Master. Uppdraget hos kund förväntas pågå mellan 1-2 år förhoppningsvis med start i november. Efter uppdraget ser vi gärna att man fortsätter hos ten10 och våra andra kunder. Det kommer även finnas möjlighet att på sikt arbeta parallellt med andra spännande projekt.
   

  

****Beskrivning****
 Uppdraget innebär att som Scrum master/agil projektledare driva och strukturera arbetet som dels sker inom ramarna för ett projekt kopplat till framtagande av en ny anläggningsstruktur samt dels inom förvaltningsteamet mellan vilka ett nära samarbete finns.
   

  

 Du kommer att vara drivande och stötta teamet som jobbar iterativt och består av både representanter från verksamheten och IT. Du är en del av ett team där behovsinsamling, strukturering av information, genomgång av arbetsflöden och utbildning ingår. Kunden genomför en förändringsresa inom digitalisering, där alla i sina respektive roller bidrar för att göra den upplevelsen så bra som möjligt för slutanvändarna.
   

  

 Du anpassar sitt arbetssätt och ambitionsnivå utifrån uppdragets specifika förutsättningar och jobbar i nära samarbete med andra roller i IT-förvaltningen samt i linjeorganisationen.
   

  

**Arbetsuppgifter**
 Kunden söker en Scrum master eller motsvarande som ska vara bryggan mellan två olika team, ett projektteam och ett förvaltningsteam
   

  

 Kunden arbetar i verktyget DevOps så kunskap om det verktyget är en förutsättning.
   

  

 Några saker du kommer göra:
   

  

* Sätta upp en struktur för hur man jobbar i Azure DevOps, anpassa Kanbantavlan så att det avspeglar hur vi arbetar
* Säkra att korrekta kort finns på Kanbantavlan för respektive sprint nedbrutna på lagom nivå (Definition of Done, hur man ska testa funktioner/resultat, etc.), och med hjälp av teamen bryta ned så att det går att utföra på 3 veckor
* Följa upp och vid behov stötta i användandet av Azure DevOps
* Hålla i Stand-up och följa upp alla kort på Kanbantavlan
* Planera och leda kommande sprintar genom backlog refinenment
* Förbereda, genomföra demo/ säkerställa att ansvariga finns för de funktioner som ska visas
* Leda demo och tillsammans med PL/förvaltningsteamet genomföra retrospecitive
* Facilitera och delta i andra möten efter behov


****Placering****
 Hybrid ute hos kund, hemma samt i våra lokaler.
   

  

**För att lyckas i rollen som** 
**teamlead** 
**måste du ha:**
* Högskole-/universitetsexamen minst 120p/180 hp inom systemvetenskap, alternativt motsvarande kompetens (med motsvarande kompetens menas erfarenhet av arbetsuppgifter enligt uppdragsbeskrivningen) förvärvad genom minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet
* Certifierad som Scrum Master
* Utbildning Azure DevOps
* Minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet att leda, planera och följa upp projekt/arbete inom IT-system eller digitala tjänster med hjälp av agila arbetssätt och metoder som Kanban, Scrum eller SAFe
* Minst 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet från Azure DevOps


****Det är extra meriterande om du har:****
* Minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet från arbete kopplat till affärssystem/ERP/asset management motsvarande IFS
* Minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet arbete med anläggningsförvaltning, till exempel hos leverantör, entreprenör eller projektstöd


**Vad får man ut av att vara en ten10are**
 Hos ten10 är det viktigt att finna en sund balans mellan privat- och arbetsliv. Vi arbetar därför alltid tillsammans för att finna vad som kan kan vara bra för din vardag. Vi erbjuder inte bara valmöjligheter hur du vill påverka din arbetsdag utan även i ersättningsmodeller. Vi erbjuder en av marknadens mest attraktiva lönemodeller och där du får kompensation för det värde du skapar.
   

  

 När du är en del av ten10 är det viktigt att du även känner det och kan dela med dig av dina erfarenheter, tankar och ideér. Detta kan du göra när vi alla ses gemensamt och umgås på AWs, utlandsresor, julbord eller när vi gör något annat kul ihop.
   

  

 Vi pratar inte bara om att vi faktiskt bryr oss om våra medarbetare utan hela vår verksamhet utgörs av våra medarbetare. Vår ambition är att skapa dem rätta förutsättningarna för just dig!

title: Platform engineer
description:
*Global migration is a 21st-century reality. Whether people are fleeing from something or racing towards better opportunity, following love or seeking new experiences, more and more are living in different environments and in new ways. We celebrate the power of people coming together. That’s why we connect ambitious people abroad with their families and friends back home so they can support each other emotionally and financially, and lead more enriched lives.*
*With international calling, money transfers, mobile top-up service and more we design products with the needs of modern migrants in mind.*
*Our ambitious team reflects our international audience. We are a diverse group of people from all over the world that come together every day—and we’re looking for others driven by the same desire to create meaningful products that bridge cultural and geographic distances.*
**Rebtel is looking for a Platform** 
**Engineer**
**About Rebtel’s Infrastructure**
 Our infrastructure is entirely cloud-based and we have components in the 3 major cloud environments (AWS, Azure, GCP). Our infrastructure hosts our customer-facing business applications as well as support systems used internally by different teams. Given how long we have been around, we have some legacy applications and systems that run on VMs in the cloud, but our preference is for containerization and cloud-first setups. We aspire for our infrastructure to be well-architected and you will coordinate this agenda, in collaboration with other teams.
   

  

 In an environment as vast as Rebtel’s, it is important to maintain thorough documentation of our systems, but even better to persist our infrastructure as code using modern tools such as Terraform. Our applications serve a global audience 24/7 and reliability is a key engineering requirement in our infrastructure. Similarly, the diversity of our product and markets requires compliance to various frameworks and standards, and you will help us to build systems to fit in the space defined by these requirements.
   

  

 Our work approach is well structured without being stifling. We use an agile workflow to handle day to day tasks. We strongly encourage collaboration as an excellent way to spread knowledge and to deliver universally relevant products and services. Given our fast-paced journey and market ambition, you will find tasks that are demanding and that will trigger your creativity. At Rebtel, everyone contributes to our customer propositions - we have quick communication channels between teams and have regular hackathons to respond to opportunities and challenges as they come.
   

  

 Rebtel is looking for a Platform engineer to join its team that is building new products and services in a modern, cloud-based ecosystem.
   

  

**About You And Your Responsibilities**
* We’re looking for an individual who we can learn from and help us take our infrastructure to the next level.
* We love to share the knowledge we have and to learn new things from you.
* You have keen interest in architecture: how to build complex systems that are maintainable.
* As a platform engineer, your role will include actively contributing towards architectural decisions. You will discuss technical solutions with the rest of the team and act as an inspiration to improve and maintain system stability, availability, and security.
* You are interested in problem solving and enjoy finding the simplest possible solution to complex problems.
* You work well with teams, even in areas besides DevOps and infrastructure, but are also capable of performing as a sole contributor in your area


**Requirements**
* Experience with Azure and, preferably, also with GCP and AWS.
* Good understanding of security in various stages from development, to Devops and through to production.
* Experience setting up CI/CD pipelines using common tools deployment tools (GIT, Azure Devops, Teamcity, Octopus, Github Actions)
* Experience with infrastructure-as-code and configuration management tools such as Terraform and Ansible
* Sound knowledge of networking principles and common concepts such as firewalls, load balancers and application gateways and debugging tools such as Wireshark.
* Good understanding of containerization using Docker, Kubernetes and Helm charts
* Experience with system administration on both Windows and \*nix based platforms including scripting using Powershell and Shell.
* Excellent communication skills in English


**Bonus points**
* Knowledge of IP telephony and related technologies/protocols such as SIP, WebRTC.
* Experience writing and automating system tests as well as incorporating them into CI/CD pipelines
* Experience working with cross functional teams on mature products with many users
* Experience working with standards for compliance in the payments industry e.g PCI


**Ideal candidate**
* 5+ years full-time professional experience (i.e., 6k+ hours)
* Committed to documenting and automating routine tasks
* Raise the level of everyone around you
* Happy hacking on new technology, loves R&D
* Always curious, always learning
* Vision for product development and for how a code base evolves
* A pleasure to work with


*We are Rebtel - People from all around the world, as of now 26, countries and more to come. We believe in equal opportunity and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.*

title: HPC Embedded SW Engineer - Infotainment
description:
Scania has decided to establish a third industrial hub in China with the capacity to produce some 50 000 vehicles per year. Alongside building a new factory and an expansion of the sales network we will also establish a local R&D organisation in China.
   

  

 Our mission in R&D Industrial Operations Asia is to develop trucks specially adapted for the Chinese market, the biggest commercial vehicle market in the world. This requires many new systems and functions to be developed, tested, and introduced.
   

  

 The work will be carried out by a dedicated organisation – which will develop and manage the products over time. The organisation will consist of colleagues from all brands within the TRATON Group together with many new colleagues from China. We are building the organisation simultaneously as we develop the product.
   

  

 The Team
   

  

 Within the E/E workstream, we have the responsibility for the electrical system and all adoptions to be made in the ECUs, displays, sensors, actuators, cable harnesses, and all the software in the vehicle and the cloud. We work in an agile, cross-functional setup.
   

  

 Most of the development of the China-specific systems and functions will be done in China but the solutions are based on the global solutions developed by the Scanias organisation in Södertälje. Therefore some of the development is easier to do from Sweden and this is where you come in. Your tasks will be to implement functionality in different high-performance ECUs where the implementation and testing can be done effectively in Södertälje Sweden. Your focus will be on functions for the HMI systems such as our driver display and center-infotainment system. The development will be done in embedded C and C++.
   

  

**Job Description And Responsibilities**
 The systems can be complex and you need to be able to understand a complex codebase and find the right place in the architecture to do the changes. When it comes to the domain knowledge for a specific system you will get good support from the teams in China and Sweden. The important thing for you is that you enjoy embedded programming and systems so that you can adapt to the task and implement new functions and test them in a suitable way. A suitable way can vary between unit tests, bench tests, simulations, HIL Riggs, or in vehicles.
   

  

 Your responsibilities:
   

  

  

* Analyze and understand the requirements coming from legislation team and system team.
* Analyze and understand HW design (schematics) and major HW component s (SoC, Micro-controller, ETH switch, EHT PHY, LIN/CAN transceiver).
* Develop application and middleware software components based on Scania High-performance software platform.
* Development should be compliant with Scania process contains: customer and system requirement analyze, SW requirement specification, software implementation, unit test, reviews and software function test.
* be an active member of an agile development team (SAFe organization, SCRUM).
* Lead some technical discussions with global platform development team.


 Your Profile
   

  

  

* Bachelor or Master Degree (Electronics, Computer science)
* Advanced embedded C/C++ programming, good understanding of SoC(Especially iMX8, S32G), Micro-controller & Hardware Basics(CAN, LIN, SPI, Ethernet);
* Experience from developing embedded Linux/QNX system (Agile development process, Continuous Integration/testing;)
* Be familiar with AP AutoSAR, experience with Vector AutoSAR toolchain (Davinci Developer, PREEvision)
* Be familiar with vehicle communication and diagnostic protocols: SOMEIP, DOIP, UDS, MQTT, Protobuf, J1939.
* Specific tools: Scripting (batch, Pyton), CANoe, CANDela, Jira, GitLab, Polarion, Google Test;
* Good communication skills;
* Be fluent in spoken and written English.


 Take the chance to join us in an exciting project where there will be a lot of experience points to gather not only within the technical areas but also on how to build an organisation and work with teams across the globe.
   

  

 More Information
   

  

 The position is a permanent position and is located in Södertälje. Working hours are daytime.
   

  

 As an employee at Scania, in addition to career and development opportunities in an international environment, we offer other benefits such as a staff car, performance bonus, occupational pension, flexible working hours, lunch at a reduced price, and much more.
   

  

 If you need further information, please contact Robin Mao, Manager for the High Performance SW development team, robin.mao@scania.com.cn
   

  

**Application**
 Your application should include a CV, copies of grades and a personal letter. Scania uses tests in the recruitment process and a background check may be conducted for this position. Continuous selection and interviews will be conducted during the application period. Apply via Career | Scania Group as soon as possible, but no later than September 8, 2024.
   

  

**Please note:** 
 If you already are a Scania employee, you shall log in and apply via MySuccess/Careers.
   

  

 Scania is a world-leading provider of transport solutions. Together with our partners and customers we are driving the shift towards a sustainable transport system. In 2022, we delivered 80,238 trucks, 4,994 buses as well as 13,400 industrial and marine power systems to our customers. Net sales totalled to over SEK 170 billion, of which 21 percent were services related. Founded in 1891, Scania now operates in more than 100 countries and employs some 57,000 people. Research and development are mainly concentrated in Sweden. Production takes place in Europe and Latin America with regional product centres in Africa, Asia and Eurasia. Scania is part of TRATON GROUP. For more information visit: www.scania.com

title: Cloud Engineer - SRE
description:
**About The Role**
 As a Cloud Engineer you will be a part of our SRE and Cloud team consisting of 3 colleagues. You will step into a broad role with various fun things to start exploring and have opportunity to play a key role in ensuring the stability and reliability of mission-critical services and systems which continously process large data volumes every day. All this while working with cutting-edge technology and having opportunities for career growth.
   

  

 Some examples of your daily work will be:
   

  

* Work with our cross-functional teams to design, implement, and monitor infrastructure and software solutions that support high availability and reliability of our services. This includes monitoring, updating, automating, and scaling in our cloud-based environment (Azure).
* Develop and maintain automation tools and scripts to detect, prevent and resolve infrastructure and software issues.
* Collaborate with development teams to identify and mitigate potential reliability risks in the design and implementation of new features and services.
* Evaluate, recommend, and implement new technologies and tools to improve service reliability, performance, and scalability.
* Write clear, concise, and comprehensive documentation of service designs, configurations, and procedures.


 So, who are you?
   

  

 Ideal applicants have a genuine interest in optimizing solutions and have previous experience from a similar role within e.g. service reliability engineering, or systems administration/development. You'll understand the software development lifecycle and have knowledge of cloud computing concepts. You are also a team player, who's constantly curious in learning new things.
   

  

 Since our corporate language is English, you must have great communication skills in English.
   

  

 You have some of the following skills and experiences:
   

  

* 3+ years experience of Microsoft Azure (or AWS)
* Microsoft SQL server
* Infracstructure as Code (IaC)
* CI/CD
* Powershell & Python
* Windows & Linux server administration


 What's in it for you?
   

  

 Voyado wouldn’t be the powerful platform it is without the people behind it. We really care for our Voyadoers and some examples of what we can offer you are:
   

  

* An engaged team with a knowledge-sharing and friendly culture
* Summits on a regular basis where we hang out, workshop, discuss, and have a good time together
* Opportunities for personal growth and learning in a dynamic and supportive environment.
* Work-life balance – we don't have a long work-hours culture, we value engagement over hours worked.


 Some of our benefits:
   

  

* 30 days of vacation, so you can spend time on the things you love
* Beneficial bike lease, including e-bikes
* Breakfast buffet on Fridays
* Your choice of phone and gadget package
* 5000 SEK in wellness allowance
* A wellness hour a week


 More on Voyado
   

  

 Voyado is the ultimate solution for personalization and relevance across all channels—online and offline. Used by retailers and e-commerce companies worldwide, Voyado makes it possible for every brand to engage customers, elevate shopping experiences, and evolve their own businesses.
   

  

 We are now a company of 300+ colleagues on an exciting journey and have recently established a presence in new markets to strengthen our position in Europe. If you are ready for your next adventure and want to join our team on our expansion throughout Europe and have an interest in customer care, e-commerce, retail, and tech - we're for you!
   

  

 Ready to join the team?
   

  

 Lovely!
   

  

 Applying is super easy. Use your LinkedIn profile (or upload a resume) and answer a few click-in questions (no data entry, we promise). We'd love to get to know you and understand what makes you tick, so write a few lines about what would be an exciting challenge for you going forward. We are eager to get to know you and what you love to do, so be yourself and let that shine through in your application!
   

  

 Additional information
   

  

 As part of our recruitment process, we conduct a background check on the final candidate. We use background checks from Scandinavian Recruitment Intelligence. Here you can read more about how a background check is done.
   

  

 Voyado is the ultimate solution for personalization and relevance across all channels—online and offline. Used by retailers and e-commerce companies worldwide, the Voyado customer experience cloud makes it possible for every brand to engage customers, elevate shopping experiences, and evolve their own businesses.

title: Data Engineer
description:
Sii Sweden is now looking for a Data Engineer to embrace the challenge of advancing our data analytics capabilities for one of our customers, a leader in the home appliances industry.
 



 In this role, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining our data infrastructure, utilizing cutting-edge technologies such as Microsoft ADLS, Databricks, SQL, PowerBI, and Qlik. You will work on complex data projects, ensuring quality data delivery and engaging in the prototyping of new solutions. Collaborate closely with an international team of data & visualization engineers, product owners, and business analysts to drive the development of innovative, data-driven solutions. Step into a role where your expertise in data engineering will directly contribute to the next generation of smart, connected home solutions.
 



 Sii focuses on your professional growth. With us, you get access to training and development programs to advance your skills and career. You can be a part of an international team where we encourage innovation, collaboration, and creativity.
 



  





**Your role** 



* Participate in discovery workshops to understand the business objectives and goals
* Define minimum viable product scope for the upcoming initiatives and outline a future roadmap of enhancements and potential improvements
* Prepare functional to technical specifications, give the needed instructions to the agile delivery team, test the product results, and ensure a quality delivery according to the business requirements
* Drive the collaboration in development and rollout efforts for the new initiatives through the Data Architect, and product teams, and actively engage in prototyping new solutions utilizing the Data Lake and Analytical solutions
* Provide training and guidance to business key users and ensure successful adoption in day-to-day operations with final solution handover to support function



  





**Your skills** 



* At least 5 years of experience delivering analytics projects
* Experience as a functional consultant or an IT Business analyst with a well-rounded understanding of analytics, agile software development, and business transformation
* Hands-on experience in analytics development with Microsoft ADLS, Databricks, SQL, PowerBI & Qlik
* Excellent communicator with strong relationship-building skills
* Extraordinary planning, communication, and presentation skills
* Ability to work in a multi-cultural environment
* Speak fluent English. Additional European languages are considered a plus

title: Engineering Digital Analyst
description:
**Description**
*Position at LeoVegas Group*
**About The Role**
 As our app-focused Engineering Digital Analyst, you will be a key member of the Analytics Engineering team, playing an important role in shaping the behavioral tracking strategy across our entire organization. In this position, you'll be hands-on with Firebase app tracking strategies, providing guidelines for developers, implementing web tracking, managing data pipelines, and working extensively with tools such as BigQuery, Google Analytics 4 (GA4), Firebase, and Google Tag Manager. Your primary responsibility will be to ensure seamless tracking and data collection, enabling Business intelligence to build reports that unlock behavioral insights for stakeholders.
   

  

 This role offers a unique opportunity to work across all brands, domains, and teams within the company, providing valuable insights that directly impact our business. You'll collaborate closely with teams such as Business Intelligence, Data Engineering, Product teams, and CRO to understand the systems and data points relevant to each group, guiding developers on best practices for data collection. Additionally, you'll operate in a high-performing live environment where your code can be deployed directly to production, allowing you to see the immediate impact of your work. This position is ideal for someone eager to challenge and improve existing processes, leading the way to a more efficient and impactful data-driven iGaming experience.
   

  

 YOU WILL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR:
   

  

* Be part of the Analytics Engineering team and work hands-on with app & web implementations, BigQuery, and data pipelines
* Have the opportunity to work with a global tracking setup of client-side tagging, server-side tagging, GA4 and Firebase
* Work across all brands, domains, verticals, and teams within the company
* Implement tracking on apps so the data can be used in BigQuery to analyze behavior to help create a better product
* Improve app tracking strategies and make sure our setup is scalable and work as it should
* Find ways to automate manual processes
* Work in a high-performing live environment, which enables you to deploy and deliver your code straight to production.
* Challenge and improve existing ways of working and lead the way to a better iGaming experience by delivering insights that bring business values and actions
* Work with Firebase, Google Analytics 4, Google Tag Manager (client and server) and BigQuery
* Guide developers on how they should implement dataLayer pushes in the client for web, and instructions on how to send events in Firebase that way the data can be collected, processed, visualized, and used as valuable insights
* Work closely with the product to understand the systems and data points applicable to each group
* Collaborate with cross-company departments to maintain organization-wide data standards.


 OUR SUCCESSFUL CANDIDATE WILL HAVE THE FOLLOWING:
   

  

**Essential Skills**
* A team player with a passion for the industry
* 3+ years of relevant work experience in Google Tag Manager (server and client)
* 3+ years of relevant work experience in Firebase
* 3+ years of relevant work experience in Google Analytics
* Experience in validating and performing QA to ensure implemented data is of top quality
* Good knowledge of JavaScript and a good understanding of web technology


 NICE TO HAVES
   

  

* Experience with Server Side Google Tag Manager
* Tableau, BigQuery


**Who We Are**
 At the core of LeoVegas Group is Team Leo. Our culture is our foundation and is what enables us to innovate, build, and lead as we trailblaze our way through the igaming industry. We’re a team of over 1400 innovators, initiators, and groundbreakers working in a fast-paced and agile environment across 11 offices worldwide.
   

  

**Benefits**
* Hybrid work policy
* 4 weeks of Workation (T&C apply)
* 30 annual vacation days
* Occupational Pension
* 5,000 SEK wellness contribution annually
* Parental Leave Top-Up
* Possibility to enroll in a private health care insurance for both you and your partner
* 1,500 SEK equipment allowance
* Benify - benefits portal with many offers and discounts
* We offer a relocation package with accommodation and flights.


 JOIN US!
   

  

 In our pride, we empower our teammates to find their roar and run with their wildest ideas. We don’t wait for things to happen; we pounce and make it happen!
   

  

 Would you be a good fit for the Leo Pride - give us a roar!
   

  

 \*\*As our company working language is English, we’d like to see your CV in English, please\*\*
   

  

 \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

title: Senior OT SOC Analyst
description:
Fortum Security Operations Centre delivers cyber security service to mitigate cyber risks and increase collective cyber resiliency across Fortum ecosystems. We are an international team composed of people with an enormous passion for cybersecurity. We prevent the risks and threats associated with everyday work on the web of all our employees and partners. Does this sound interesting to you? Keep on reading!
   

  

**About The Role**
 Senior OT SOC Analyst is a subject matter expert responsible for managing threats, disseminating information, handling, and responding to, as well as investigating all incident escalations from the Operational Technology Security Operations Centre.
   

  

**Main Responsibilities Include**
* Analyse and review escalated cases until closure; this includes investigating and recommending appropriate corrective actions for OT security incidents which includes communicating with the implementation staff responsible.
* Research, develop, and keep abreast of testing tools, techniques, and process improvements in support of security event detection and incident response.
* Participate with onboarding new log sources and provide expertise about needed sources, develop, and maintain detection rules.
* Writing technical reports detailing how the evidence was discovered and all the steps taken during the retrieval process (timeline).
* This role includes business trips – usually 1 per month


**About You**
* Engineering degree in computer science or energy industry, or similar
* 5+ years of experience in cybersecurity
* Fluency in Swedish and English (min. B2 level)
* Knowledge about OT/ICS systems (SCADA, PLC)
* Knowledge about OT security concepts, for example network segmentation, monitoring
* At least 2 years of practical experience in data analysis from OT devices for anomalies and misconfiguration
* Hands on experience working with Incident Response and Cyber Threat Intelligence
* Experience with onboarding under OT SOC monitoring
* Familiarity with SIEM/SOAR


**We offer you**
* An interesting role focusing on cyber security in a critical infrastructure industry
* Modern tools and possibility to improve processes
* Internal and external trainings
* Wide range of benefits described here
* Hybrid work model (we meet in the office 2 times a week)
* Holistic view on wellbeing as part of our culture


**Interested?**
 Please send your application with salary request via our online recruitment tool. We work with an ongoing selection and will close the recruitment process as soon as the right candidate is found. For further information, please contact Marcin Poslad, Senior Manager, Security Ops Center by email marcin.poslad@fortum.com.
   

  

 At Fortum, we are committed to building diverse teams where everyone feels included and is treated equally.
   

  

 To be selected for the position, the applicant must go through background clearance and a health examination including drug testing.
   

  

**We offer you**
 At Fortum, we believe in a better future and want to be involved in shaping it. Our workplace is a safe place, both physically and mentally. You will grow with professional colleagues, being trusted and free to challenge yourself. We offer comprehensive benefits, flexible working hours, and hybrid work model to support your productivity, development and wellbeing. We are committed to build diverse teams where everyone feels included and is treated equally.
   

  

 More information about our culture and benefits can be found here.
   

  

 Contact details to union representatives can be found on the bottom of this page.
   

  

**We are Fortum**
 Fortum is a Nordic energy company. Our purpose is to power a world where people, businesses and nature thrive together. We are one of the cleanest energy producers in Europe and our actions are guided by our ambitious environmental targets. We generate and deliver clean energy reliably and help industries to decarbonise their processes and grow. Our core operations in the Nordics comprise of efficient, CO2-free power generation as well as reliable supply of electricity and district heat to private and business customers. For our :5 000 employees, we commit to be a safe, and inspiring workplace. Fortum's share is listed on Nasdaq Helsinki. fortum.com

title: Digital Production Lead
description:
**About Bannerflow**
 Our mission is to accelerate creativity and collaboration for marketing teams, at scale and across channels. To be able to deliver on this, we have defined five must-win battles that will guide us to success; People & Culture, Product-driven Revenue Growth, Successful International Expansion, Maintain & Grow our Commercial Journey and Sustainable Tech Platform for the future.
   

  

 Bannerflow is a high growth company and one of Europe's most exciting SaaS companies. We build a Creative Management Platform that allows enterprise brands to create, publish, analyze and optimize advertising in-house, at scale. As part of the Bannerflow team you will get the opportunity to work with a creative, enabling, and premium close-based architecture. Our creative management platform serves more than 6 billion ads each month, viewed on 500 million unique devices all over the world.
   

  

**Role Purpose**
 We are looking for our next Digital Production Lead to steer our Creative Service offer to our customers. You will be responsible for overseeing operational activities, processes and ensuring a productive, revenue-driven workforce, and driving customer satisfaction through exceptional service delivery. In this role, you will work closely with our Digital Production Manager, external partners & Manager of Operation. Together you will collaborate with various customer-facing roles to refine and enhance workflows both internally and externally. Creative Services is an internal consultant solution that can be used in several parts of the customer journey, such as: meeting prospect, retention and fast phased onboarding when required.
   

  

**Who are you?**
* Experienced Production Lead, preferably with an agency background.
* Strong relationship-building skills with stakeholders at all levels.
* Results-driven, proactive, and excellent at managing expectations.
* Strong project management skills and ability to drive projects to completion.
* Passionate about digital marketing and thrive in a fast-paced environment.
* Bonus: Good eye for digital design.
* Excellent English communication skills; additional languages are a plus.


**What You Will Do**
* Manage budget and reporting for Creative Services.
* Lead and project manage Creative services, collaborating closely with external partners.
* Implement tailored solutions to address customer challenges.
* Grow Creative Services and enhance its value through sales and customer success collaboration.
* Drive internal projects to improve customer experience, scalability, and process optimization.


 This role is a lead position for the function where you will handle and grow the function of production in order to make sure it's a streamlined process. You will not have any personnel responsibility but you will be a lead of the function itself.
   

  

**Why join us?**
 We live alongside our values Collaboration, Passion, and Challenge; with many events going on at Bannerflow such as health month, after work, inspiration sessions, workouts, and hackathons, there’s something for everyone.
   

  

 We are committed to building a diverse and inclusive team and welcome applications from candidates of all backgrounds, experiences, and abilities.
   

  

 We offer a hybrid workplace and a competitive compensation package including pension according to ITP1, health allowance, parental leave top-up and health care insurance.
   

  

 Please note that the recruitment process will slow down during the summer months. We appreciate your patience during this period and will get back to you as soon as we are all well-rested and ready for fall!

title: Projektledare
description:
Vår kund har ett akut behov för en projektledare för två löpande projekt.
   

  

 Projekt 1:
   

  

 Ett av projekten är i ett kritiskt läge företaget ska gå över till en ny autentiseringslösning för deras LMS-system. Just nu är projektet i test, justering samt godkännandefas. Utöver att leda återstående planering och genomförande av detta, återstår att planera för hur de skall kunna utföra migrering.
   

  

 Projekt 2: Likande som projekt 1, men i uppstartsfas.
   

  

 Uppdragslängd: Cirka 3-4 månader med start v 34.
   

  

 Vi söker dig som:
   

  

* Är en erfaren projektledare
* Har erfarenhet från autentiseringslösningar
* Tidigare har varit projektledare för projekt i planering, test, implementering samt godkännande fas.
* Kunskap och erfarenhet av LMS är meriterande (Learning Management System)


 Ansökningar inklusive uppdaterad cv mottas via denna annons.

title: Communication Specialist to Xylem
description:
Join Xylem as a Communication Specialist passionate about water infrastructure! Craft compelling content for digital and printed materials, manage social media channels and deep dive into product positioning. Embrace innovation in a collaborative environment. Apply now!
 


 Apply here!
 
  

**Company :**
 Xylem Water Solutions Global Services AB
 



  

**City :**
 Sundbyberg
 



  

**Job Category :**
 Marketing / Information / Media
 



  

**Extent :**
 Full time, consulting assignment 1 year
 



  

**Start date :**
 ASAP/ according to the agreement
 



  

**Type of work :**
 Staffing
 



  

**Other :**
 Possibility to work remote
   




**About the role**

 As a Communication Specialist consultant at Xylem you will responsible for product content creation as well as driving global social media channels for Flygt and Godwin, some of our largest wastewater management and dewatering product brands. This role is made for you if you are a creative individual passionate about driving innovation within the water infrastructure sector. It's advantageous if you enjoy learning about technology and share our excitement for advancing the water sector.
 


  


 In this role, flexibility is key as you'll handle diverse tasks beyond social media management. You will, for example, lead communication initiatives to create internal awareness on our product launches, and collaborate with product management to create engaging marketing materials. Furthermore, you'll optimize user experience with our web content, and collaborate with international teams to enhance brand visibility and engagement.
 


  


  

**We assume you are curious to get to know Xylem better? You can do that easily by watching this video:**



  

  


 Xylem has also won several different awards, one of which is the "guldknappen", where they have been named Sweden's most parent-friendly workplace, as they work to ensure that their employees can combine work life with private life.
   




**Work tasks**

 Through the link, you can review an example of what the team at Xylem is working on today:
   

**Flygt Concertor XPC**



  

  
* Collaborate with product management and engineering to understand and be able to communicate our products’ unique features, benefits, and outcomes.
  
* Develop and distribute content on Flygt and Godwin social media channels, especially YouTube and LinkedIn, and optimize these channels for better search rankings.
  
* Ensure the functionality and efficiency of all Flygt and Godwin websites referenced in social media.
  
* Lead the development of our internal SharePoint portal for product launches.
  
* Adhere to Xylem’s brand guidelines across social media and product marketing materials and support the development and execution of product launch plans.
  

  


**We are looking for**
  
* 2-3 years proven experience in social media management and content marketing, with focus on video creation and editing.
  
* Familiarity with SEO, especially YouTube SEO.
  
* Bachelor’s degree in communications or marketing studies.
  
* Proficiency in video editing tool management.
  
* Excellent communication skills in English, both oral and written.
  


  


  

**It is meritorious if you have**



  

  
* Experience working in international B2B technical companies.
  
* Proficiency in graphic design software.
  


  


  

**To succeed in the role, your personal skills are:**



  

  
* Analytical mindset
  
* Problem-solving
  
* Proactivity
  
* Flexibility
  


  

  

**Our recruitment process**
  


 This recruitment process is handled by Academic Work and it is our client’s wish that all questions regarding the position is directed to Academic Work.
 


  


 Our selection process is continuous and the advert may close before the recruitment process is completed if we have moved forward to the next phase. The process includes two tests: one personality test and one cognitive test. The tests are tools to find the right talent for the right position, to enable equality, diversity, and a fair process.
   




**Become a part of Academic Work**

 When you apply to this job, you are becoming one of many consultants at Academic Work. This means that not only will you gain fantastic benefits, but also a team of consultant managers to support you through your career with us.
 


 Read more about Academic Work
   

**Do you have questions about this job?**

 Lina Ericsson or a colleague in the recruitment team will gladly answer you on sth1@academicwork.se Please specify advert-ID in your email: 15105904

title: Erfaren drifttekniker
description:
Är du en erfaren drifttekniker med passion för IT-drift och problemlösning? Vill du vara en del av ett kompetent IT-team? Då kan denna tjänst i Stockholm vara perfekt för dig!
   

  

 Vi söker nu en drifttekniker till ett uppdrag hos vår kunds driftteam. Du kommer att fokusera på den gemensamma server- och nätverksmiljön, samt hantering av applikations- och systemdrift.
   

  

 Som konsult på Centric får du en trygg anställning och samlar på dig värdefull arbetslivserfarenhet på uppdrag hos våra kunder. Din konsultchef stöttar dig i din utveckling där du hela tiden fyller på med nya erfarenheter och kunskaper. En utmärkt möjlighet att göra karriär.
   

  

**Dina arbetsuppgifter** 
 Du kommer att fokusera på den gemensamma server- och nätverksmiljön, samt hantering av applikations- och systemdrift. Du kommer att arbeta med Microsoftlösningar och nätverksinfrastruktur, inklusive system som SQL, Exchange, Hyper-V och SAN.
   

  

 Kundens arbetsmiljö är varierad med både onPrem-servrar i egna lokaler och hos tredjepartsleverantörer, där miljön i huvudsak är Microsoftbaserad.
   

  

**Din profil och kvalifikationer** 
 För att trivas i rollen som erfaren drifttekniker tror vi att du är social, engagerad och hjälpsam, både i kundmöten, i kontakt med andra intressenter och i samarbetet med kollegor. Det är också viktigt att du är strukturerad, noggrann och har en stark egen drivkraft samt förmågan att förklara komplex teknik på ett enkelt sätt.
   

  

**Du Har**
* Relevant eftergymnasial utbildning
* Minst fem års erfarenhet som drifttekniker eller i en likvärdig roll
* Erfarenhet av installation, drift, felsökning och underhåll av Windows-servermiljöer
* Kunskaper inom virtualisering, lagring och backup
* Grundläggande förståelse för nätverk, switchar, routing och brandväggar
* Erfarenhet av Microsoft 365s olika tjänster och produkter


**Vad vi erbjuder** 
 På Centric får du de verktyg du behöver för att nå dina mål. Vi erbjuder alla våra konsulter kvalificerade utbildningar och certifieringar inom den senaste tekniken. Vi tycker nämligen att våra medarbetare hela tiden ska fortsätta att utvecklas. Därför erbjuder vi dig möjligheten att lägga upp en individuell utbildningsplan, där vi bekostar såväl studiematerial som själva certifieringarna. Under din utveckling kommer vi matcha din kompetens mot rätt uppdrag i takt med att du avancerar. Vi genomför regelbundet spännande aktiviteter där du som konsult får möjlighet att träffa och umgås med dina kollegor under roliga och avslappnande former.
   

  

*Mer om oss*
 Centric är ett IT-företag med 380 anställda, med kontor i Stockholm, Göteborg, Malmö, Linköping och Örebro. Vi specialiserar oss på uthyrning av generalister och förmedling av specialister samt erbjuder outsourcing och systemlösningar inom retail. Vi är medlem i Almega Kompetensföretagen och följer deras tecknade kollektivavtal med Unionen.

title: Lead Electronics Engineer
description:
**We** 
**don’t** 
**just build technology. We build hope for everyone dealing with cancer.**
*Are you ready to embark on a journey where you’ll be part of a dynamic team shaping the future of cancer care technology? Jump onboard, and let's make a difference together.*
**What You Will Do**
 We are currently looking for a Lead Electronics Engineer to join our cross-functional team working on the development of a radiotherapy device. Our development works with the SAFe framework and uses Scrum at the team level. You'll enjoy a broad set of tasks and responsibilities, working on systems and subsystem-level in our projects as well as diving into the details and working hands-on in labs and test sites. You will report to the Hardware Infrastructure Manager, located in Stockholm.
   

  

 Responsibilities:
   

  

* Develop electronics and firmware for existing and future subsystems, ensuring safe and efficient product development within the assigned scope.
* Contribute to risk analysis, requirements analysis, subsystem architecture, design, and subsystem verification.
* Adhere to the Elekta quality system and introduce improvements to enhance its effectiveness.
* Stay updated with technical advancements in the field.
* Decide on design solutions and their implementation.
* Review electronics design and related documents.


**What You Will Bring**
 We're looking for a team player who excels at juggling multiple tasks and embraces change with enthusiasm. You are self-motivated, work independently, have a can-do attitude, and possess a problem-solving mindset. Additionally, you have:
   

  

* Master of Science in Electrical Engineering or equivalent.
* Seven years or more of professional experience in electrical engineering.
* Proven experience in power electronics both high level and low level.
* Previous experience leading requirement and testing automation work.
* Solid experience in Altium or similar tools.
* Experience in LabVIEW or similar tools for creating automatic test environments.
* Fluency in English, both written and verbal.


 It would be advantageous if you are fluent in Swedish and/or have experience working with medical technical products, but not a must.
   

  

**What You'll Get**
* 30 vacation days/year, plus an additional 4 Elekta days off/year (plus bank holidays).
* Ability to purchase additional vacation days.
* Attractive defined contribution pension scheme.
* Private Medical Insurance.
* Lunch Benefit.
* Contribution to wellness activities.
* Hybrid work option (you are required to work on location at least 3 days/week).


**Hiring Process**
 We look forward to hearing from you! Apply by submitting your application and résumé in English via the “Apply” button.
   

  

**Your Elekta contact**
 For questions, please contact the responsible Nidhi Sarkar, Global Talent Acquisition Partner at nidhi.sarkar@elekta.com. Please note, we do not accept applications through e-mail.
   

  

**We are an Equal Opportunity Employer**
 We evaluate qualified applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information, national origin, disability, veteran status, or any other protected characteristic.

title: Senior Knowledge Graph Engineer
description:
LTIMindtree is a global technology consulting and digital solutions company that enables enterprises across industries to reimagine business models, accelerate innovation, and maximize growth by harnessing digital technologies. As a digital transformation partner to more than 750 clients, LTIMindtree brings extensive domain and technology expertise to help drive superior competitive differentiation, customer experiences, and business outcomes in a converging world.
 



  





 Powered by nearly 90,000 talented and entrepreneurial professionals across more than 30 countries, LTIMindtree — a Larsen & Toubro Group company — combines the industry-acclaimed strengths of erstwhile Larsen and Toubro Infotech and Mindtree in solving the most complex business challenges and delivering transformation at scale.
 



  





 We are looking for a highly skilled and dedicated
 **Senior Knowledge Graph Engineer** 
 to join our team. This role focuses on the development and integration of ontologies and the construction of knowledge graphs to enhance data understanding and usage across our systems.
 



  





**Profile:** 




  




* 10+ Years of Experience
* Experience with Graph technologies and tools such as Stardog Metaphactory or equivalent
* Experience with Reasoning and Inferencing creating data validation processes using SHACL SPARQL etc
* Experience with knowledge representation languages like RDF OWL
* Working experience on agile methodology and good communication skills
* User onboarding platform monitoring
* Troubleshoot technical issues and help team in root cause analysis
* Support Incident Management Problem Management and Change Management
* Patch update service rollout



  






 What You Can Expect
 




  




* Become part of one of the fastest growing IT services companies in the world
* Organization driven by team spirit and technology
* Entrepreneurial culture where you can influence and grow
* Competitive Salary as per Market Standards
* Work life balance
* Market benefits

title: Senior Frontend Engineer
description:
**About Carla**
 At Carla, we believe that more people should be able to drive electric vehicles. That’s why we’re building the safest, most convenient, and transparent way to buy, sell, or lease an electric car online. Founded in 2020 in Stockholm with strong VC backing, Carla is now in an exciting growth phase.
 



**About the Role**
 We are seeking a talented and motivated senior level Frontend Engineer to join our Product / Tech team. Our team is all about crafting software that feels natural, honest, and joyful to use. We care deeply about the details of usability, accessibility, and performance, and we work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure that the products we build support our business objectives. As a Senior Frontend Engineer, you will play a key role in disrupting the used car industry by envisioning and implementing ambitious software solutions, both for our internal and external users.
 



 The development team is remote-first (EU timezone only), and this is primarily a fully remote position. If you live in Stockholm, Sweden, you are also more than welcome to work from the office. Let us know what works best for you!
 



**What you’ll get to do:** 



* Develop our internal applications written in ReScript as well as our public facing website running Next.js and TypeScript.
* Contribute to all stages in the product development cycle: design, implementation, testing, deployment, and maintenance.
* Build software in a cross functional team with UX, design, product and engineering working together as one.
* Learn and grow your wider skills from senior colleagues across many disciplines / departments at a startup where you can stay close to the entire business.



**Who we look for:** 



* At least 5+ years of working experience as a frontend engineer
* A plus if you have experience with ReScript or any other functional programming language
* Skilled in React
* Curiosity to learn new tools, technologies and languages
* A good communicator. Enjoys discussing different solutions to solve technical as well as UX problems
* Empathy. The ambition and will to empower the people around you, a mindset of leading through example



**Some of the technologies we work with** 



* ReScript for our internal system called BackOffice
* TypeScript and Javascript - for our external website on carla.se
* React
* Next.js
* Relay
* GraphQL
* CSS/HTML



**What is in it for you?**
 Most of all, this is a fantastic opportunity to work for a category-defining company, with great values, and a business model that doesn't talk about sustainability - but is based on it.
 **Apart from that we offer:**



* Joining one of Sweden’s LinkedIn 2022 & 2023 Top 10 Startups
* A career-defining role at an early-stage startup and an opportunity to grow and learn from knowledgeable co-workers
* We’re a start-up, which means we work smarter, not harder. Life-work balance still plays an important role in creating long-lasting productivity and output
* A workplace that believes strength is found in diversity. We hire people regardless of background, education, experience or gender
* Market competitive salary and stock option program
* GraphQL
* CSS/HTML



 So, If you are looking to join a capable and collaborative team and directly impact both product quality and team effectiveness, apply today! We’re fast, both in terms of recruitment and when it comes to growing our business. We have no plans on stopping anytime soon, and hopefully, this is where you come in!
 



**Please submit your application by including your CV, LinkedIn, GitHub or Portfolio.**

title: Inside Account Manager –	Printing Solutions, Sweden
description:
You’re out to reimagine and reinvent what’s possible - in your career as well as the world around you.
   

  

 So are we. We love taking on tough challenges, disrupting the status quo, and creating what’s next. We’re in search of talented people who are inspired by big challenges, driven to learn and grow, and dedicated to making a meaningful difference.
   

  

 We are 55,000 HP employees, united in creating technology that makes life better for everyone, everywhere. We have the broadest Printing Solutions portfolio in the market that more and more customers want to acquire as a service. Interested in joining us? Let’s talk.
   

  

 For our End User Sales Printing Solutions in Sweden, we are looking for Inside Account Manager, responsible for Corporate, Enterprise, Mid-market and Public segment customers in Sweden.
   

  

**WHY DOES THIS ROLE MATTER?**
 Your job is to help our customers succeed. You as a
 *skilled specialist* 
 will contribute to the development of new concepts and to complete assignments in innovative and effective ways. You have a good knowledge on the general aspects of the job. You will work on assignments where a strong degree of independent judgment, initiative, technical knowledge and consultative selling approach are required to be successful.
   

  

**WHAT THIS ROLE WILL BRING YOU?**
* Opportunities for growth and development: As an Inside Account Manager, you will have the opportunity to learn, grow, and develop professionally as well as personally.
* Collaborative work environment: You will work in close cooperation with other End-User Account Managers, Technical Consultants, and Managed Print Service Specialists in the country, as well as with many different stakeholders abroad.
* Making a difference: By helping your clients to innovate and be successful, you will be making a meaningful difference in their businesses and ensuring they make the most out of HP technology and services.


 Your job, together with our business partners, is to help our customers succeed. You are responsible for delivering the best service in the industry to your appointed customers and partners. You will work in close co-operation with other End-User Account Managers, Technical Consultants and Managed Print Service Specialists in the country. As we are truly international organization, you will also work with many different stakeholders abroad.
   

  

 This is a sales role where HP think that you use your ears and mouth in a proportional way. You will connect directly with end-customers as well as build strong relationships with our resellers and distribution channel in Printing Solutions area. You will also be helping your clients to innovate and help them to be successful and ensure they make the most out of HP technology and services. This means that you need to be fluent in both Swedish and English.
   

  

 There will also be large elements of reaching out to HP partners proactively and maintaining regularity in the communication between them and HP. You will be the one pointing at different opportunities that we bring to the table.
   

  

 In the role of Inside Account Manager, the main tasks will include:
   

  

* Take accountability of your assigned end customers by building a pipeline and business opportunities.
* Proactively sell products, solutions and services to achieve highest levels of customer satisfaction.
* Coordination of sales activities.
* Reach out to partners proactively and maintaining regularity in the communication between them and HP.
* Actively reach out to your customers to understand potential business opportunities.
* Hold in-person meetings with potential customers in our showroom by demonstrating a value of HP products, services and solutions.
* Be confident discussing products, solutions and services and be able to offer support as required to HP´s customers.
* Assist partners with product information and pricing queries.
* Execute campaign follow-up and lead management.
* Support Senior Account Managers to manage their largest customers in Sweden.


 In HP Sweden we want to offer you an inspiring workplace where all our people love to be, collaborate well together and where they can learn, grow and develop professionally as well as personally. We offer you a modern workplace experience with tools allowing you to work in the office as well as remotely.
   

  

**WHAT WE NEED YOU TO BRING TO THE ROLE?**
 We are looking for a candidate with good sales and communicative skills. You are fluent in both Swedish and English and have interest to grow and develop in your role. You will be provided a comprehensive onboarding for HP processes and guidelines as well as training for HP products, services and solutions portfolio as part of our annual Sales Certification Program. Furthermore, we see that you have the drive, curiosity, enthusiasm and commitment to be successful in your role.
   

  

**Important For The Role**
* Previous B2B sales experience preferable
* Strong team player
* High degree of self-motivation and "can do" attitude
* Ability to communicate with people at all levels
* We will attribute great importance to personal suitability


**JOB TYPE**
 The assignment is a permanent position and will be filled immediately as we are recruiting on a continuous basis during the application period.
   

  

 We are looking for persons who are ready to make an impact on the way the world works. At HP, the future is yours to create.
   

  

 Thanks for taking the time to review our job, if you think it is a match to your experience and interests please apply today - we are eager to learn more about you

title: Community Associate
description:
At Regus, we’ve built the world’s largest workspace network so that our customers can work better, faster, happier. Join us in one of our Regus centre teams. Bring more freedom to more people and businesses. And you’ll be able to work better, faster and happier too.
   

  

**The opportunity**
 As a Community Associate, you’ll work closely with new and existing customers, solving problems for them and making sure they have everything they need.
   

  

**A typical day at Regus**
 You arrive 15 minutes before your centre opens to make sure everything is ready and check there’s nothing the cleaners have missed.
   

  

 Customers start coming in thick and fast. One asks you for a changed WiFi code. Another wants to know if his important package has arrived. A woman needs directions to her meeting room… and can you help her set up the projector and take an order for drinks?
   

  

 The mail arrives. You sort through it while dealing with a whole host of other customer requests, remembering to email the customer from earlier to let him know his package is waiting for him in his mailbox. And that’s lunch.
   

  

 Early afternoon, you sit down with the Community Manager to discuss the organisation of next week’s networking event. You plan and write the invites to customers, then create, print and put up posters on the noticeboards around the centre.
   

  

 The day is coming to a close. Time to gently ask the large group in meeting room 3 to start wrapping up. You direct them to the nice restaurant you know around the corner, so they can grab a bite and continue their discussion. Once the last person has left the building and everything’s nice and tidy, it’s time to head home.
   

  

**About You**
 We’re looking for someone who knows how to manage multiple tasks while providing customers with the best possible service. You also need to be:
   

  

* A good communicator, with the ability to build strong professional relationships and empathise with people’s needs
* Happy taking ownership of problems and finding ways to solve them
* Positive, enthusiastic and able to adapt to fast-changing situations
* Confident using MS Office and other basic IT packages


**What We Offer**
 On top of a competitive salary package you’ll enjoy:
   

  

* A bright and inspiring work environment
* Training and development opportunities

title: Junior projektresurs samt senior projektledare inom försäkringsområdet
description:
Beskrivning
   

  

 Vi söker nu två kunniga och engagerade personer för att ersätta under föräldraledighet samt stärka projektresurserna inom ramen för arbete med Governance AE Sak och anpassning till DORA. I dessa roller får du möjlighet att arbeta med viktiga projekt inom produktstyrning, regelverk och avtalshantering, samt bidra till framgångsrik implementering av DORA-regelverket.
   

  

 Arbetsuppgifter
   

  

 De huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifterna innefattar:
   

  

* Governance AE Sak:
+ Ansvara för produktgodkännande och uppföljning.
+ Hantera styrdokument och regelverk.
+ Stödja bevakning och anpassning av regelverk, samt delta i projektetablering.
+ Hantera rekommendationer från kontrollfunktioner.

* DORA-projektledning:
+ Leda projektplanering, koordinering och kommunikation kopplat till anpassning för DORA.
+ Upprätta och underhålla IKT-tjänsteregistret i enlighet med koncernkrav.
+ Kartlägga processer och informationstillgångar.
+ Bidra till ytterligare aktiviteter kopplade till DORA, i samverkan med koncernprojektet.

* Avtalshantering:
+ Driva pågående avtalsstädning och säkerställa att avtalshanteringen är enhetlig.
+ Hantera avtal i förhållande till DORA, hållbarhet och inköp.


 Kvalifikationer
   

  

 Vi söker två profiler med följande kvalifikationer:
   

  

**Profil 1: Senior Projektledare (50%)**
* Stark förmåga att driva förändring och koordinera mellan flera intressenter.
* Erfarenhet av liknande projekt, gärna inom LF.
* Ledarskap och strategisk kommunikationsförmåga.
* Minst 1–3 års erfarenhet som konsult inom aktuellt område.


**Profil 2: Junior Projektresurs (100%)**
* Noggrannhet och förmåga att koordinera och genomföra projektuppgifter.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med liknande projekt, gärna med LF-kunskap.
* Självständighet i utförande av arbetsuppgifter, men med stöd i större sammanhang.


 Villkor
   

  

 Tjänsterna motsvarar tillsammans 1,5 heltidstjänster, där senior projektledare arbetar på 50% och junior projektresurs på 100%. Du erbjuds en dynamisk och utvecklande arbetsmiljö med möjlighet att bidra till viktiga förändringar inom företaget. Du får även möjligheten att utveckla din egen kompetens och arbeta i nära samarbete med ledande experter inom området.
   

  

 Detta är konsultuppdrag där du blir anställd av Q och arbetar på uppdrag hos klient.
   

  

 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!
   

  

 Q har kollektivavtal och är medlem i branschorganisationen Almega samt i Svenskt Näringsliv. Företaget erbjuder interims- och rekryteringslösningar inom branscherna IT, teknik, administration, ekonomi, industri samt lager/logistik med personallösningar inom olika befattningsnivåer.
   

  

 Anställningsform: tidsbegränsad anställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid/deltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: Heltid/deltid | Ort: Stockholm | Län: Stockholms län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: 2024/354 | Publicerat: 2024-08-28 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2024-08-30

title: Projektadministratör
description:
**Vi på Future People söker en projektadministratör** 
**till vår kund i centrala Stockholm. Som konsult hos oss får du möjlighet till ett spännande uppdrag hos en av våra kunder samtidigt som du fortsätter att utvecklas inom ditt kompetensområde. Vi är mycket måna om att du ska trivas hos oss och på ditt uppdrag. Hos oss är du en viktig och uppskattad person, både som anställd och som kollega.**
**Ta nästa steg i karriären och utvecklas tillsammans med oss!**
 Vår kund arbetar dygnet runt, året om, tryggar dem den växande Stockholmsregionens tillgång till värme, kyla, el samt hantering av avfallstjänster. Idag är fler än 800 000 stockholmare och drygt 400 sjukhus, datahallar och andra verksamheter anslutna till fjärrvärmenätet, kopplat till deras värme- och kraftvärmeanläggningar från Högdalen i söder till Brista i norr. Med gemensam kraft driver dem Stockholm framåt med potential att bli världens första klimatpositiva huvudstad.
   

  

 I denna varierande roll kommer du att arbeta med projektadministration där du stöttar och avlastar hela projektorganisationen främst projektledare och delprojektledare med administrativa arbetsuppgifter inom projektet. Arbetsuppgifterna är varierande då projektadministratören är flexibel och anpassar sig efter projektens specifika utformning och behov.
   

  

**Arbetsuppgifter:**
* Uppföljning av fakturor – gentemot avtal/ inköpsordrar, tidssedlar, konsulter
* Skapa inköpsrekvisitioner, utökning av inköpsordrar, avsluta/stänga inköpsordrar
* Fakturahantering, kontroll av inkommande fakturor
* Agera support i IFS till projektorganisationen.
* Avtalshantering – inköp
